Verse: Thus We have revealed it as an Arabic Qur’ān, and We have distributed in it [statements] of threats, so that they may fear, or it may arouse in them a remembrance.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: So exalted be God, the King, the Truth. And do not hasten with the Qur’ān before its revelation is completed for you, and say, ‘My Lord, increase me in knowledge’.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And We made a covenant with Adam before, but he forgot, and We did not find in him any constancy.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And when We said to the angels, ‘Prostrate before Adam’; so they prostrated, except Iblīs: he refused.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Then We said, 'Adam, indeed this is an enemy of yours and of your wife. So do not let him cause you both to be expelled from the Garden, so that you then toil.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: It is indeed [assured] for you that you will neither be hungry therein nor go naked,

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And it is indeed [assured] for you neither to be thirsty therein, nor to suffer the sun'.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Then Satan whispered to him saying, 'O Adam, shall I guide you to the Tree of Immortality, and a kingdom that does not waste away?'

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: So both of them ate of it, and their shameful parts were exposed to them, and they began to piece together onto themselves leaves of the Garden. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and so he erred.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Thereafter his Lord chose him, and relented to him, and guided him.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: He said, 'Go down both of you from it all together, some of you being enemies of others. Yet if there should come to you guidance from Me, then whoever follows My guidance shall not go astray, neither shall he be miserable.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: But whoever disregards My remembrance, his shall be a straitened life. And on the Day of Resurrection We shall bring him to the assembly, blind'.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: He shall say, 'My Lord, why have you brought be to the assembly blind, though I used to see?'

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: He will say, 'So it is. Our signs came to you, but you forgot them; and so today you will be forgotten'.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And so We requite him who is prodigal and believes not in the signs of his Lord. And the chastisement of the Hereafter is more terrible and more enduring.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Is it not a guidance to them how many We destroyed before them of generations amid [the ruins of] whose dwelling-places they walk? Surely in that there are signs for people of sense.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And but for a decree that had already preceded from your Lord, it would have been an inevitability and a specified term.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: So be patient with what they say and make glorifications by praising your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before its setting, and in the watches of the night, and make glorifications at either side of the day, that perhaps you may be pleased.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And do not extend your glance toward what We have given to some pairs among them to enjoy, [as] the flower of the life of this world that We may try them thereby. And your Lord's provision is better and more enduring.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And bid your family to prayer, and be steadfast in [the maintenance of] it. We do not ask of you any provision. We [it is Who] provide you, and the [best] sequel will be in favour of God-fearing.

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: And they say, 'Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?' Has there not come to them the clear proof of what is in the former scriptures?

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Had We destroyed them with a chastisement before him, they would have said: 'Our Lord, if only You had sent us a messenger, so that we might have followed those signs of Yours before we were [thus] abased and disgraced?'

Name: Tâ Hâ
Verse: Say: 'Each is waiting. So wait! For you shall indeed know who are the followers of the even path and who is [rightly] guided'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Nigh has drawn for mankind their reckoning, yet they are heedless, disregardful.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: There does not come to them any new reminder from their Lord, but they listen to it as they play

Name: The Prophets
Verse: with their hearts preoccupied. And they are secret in [their] conference, [they] the evildoers: 'Is this other than a [mortal] human being like yourselves? Will you then take [to] sorcery, even though you are able to see?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He said, 'My Lord knows the words in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Hearer, the Knower'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Nay but they say, 'A muddle of nightmares. Nay, he has fabricated it; nay, he is a poet! So let him bring us a sign, such as was sent to the ancients'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: No town before them ever believed of those that We destroyed. Would they then believe?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We sent none before you other than men to whom We revealed. Ask the People of the Remembrance if you do not know.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We did not make them bodies that did not eat food, and they were not immortal.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Then We fulfilled to them the promise. So We delivered them and whomever We would, and We destroyed the prodigal.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Now We have sent down [as revelation] to you, a Book in which there is the remembrance that is yours. Will you not understand?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And how many did We destroy of towns that had been wrongdoing, and brought forth another people after it!

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And when they felt Our might, behold, they ran away from it.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: 'Do not run [away]! Return to the opulence, which you were given to enjoy and your dwelling-places, that perhaps you might be asked'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'O woe to us! We have indeed been doing wrong'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: So that remained their cry until We made them as reaped [crops], stilled.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and all that is between them, playing.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Had We desired to find some diversion, We would have found it with Ourselves, were We to do [so].

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Nay, but We hurl the truth against falsehood, and it obliterates it, and behold, it vanishes. And for you, there shall be woe for what you ascribe.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth, and those who are near Him do not disdain to worship Him, nor do they weary.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They glorify [Him] night and day, and they do not falter.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Or have they chosen gods from the earth who resurrect?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Had there been in [either of] them gods other than God, the two would have surely deteriorated. So glory be to God the Lord of the Throne, above what they ascribe.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He shall not be questioned about what He does, but they shall be questioned.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Or have they chosen besides Him gods? Say: 'Bring your proof. This is the Remembrance of those with me and the Remembrance of those before me. Nay, but most of them do not know the truth, and so they are disregardful'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We did not send any Messenger before you but We revealed to him that, 'There is no god except Me, so worship Me'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And they say, 'The Compassionate One has taken a son'. Glory be to Him! Nay, but they are [merely] servants who are honoured.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They do not [venture to] speak before Him and they act according to His command.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He knows what is before them and what is behind them, and they do not intercede except for him with whom He is satisfied, and they, for awe of Him, are apprehensive.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And should any of them say, 'I am a god besides Him', such a one We will requite with Hell. Thus We requite wrong-doers.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Have they not realised, those who disbelieve, that the heavens and the earth were closed together and then We parted them, and We made, of water every living thing? Will they not then believe?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We set in the earth firm mountains lest it should shake with them, and We set in them ravines, as roads that perhaps they may be guided.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We made the heaven a roof preserved; and yet of the signs thereof, they are disregardful.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And He it is Who created the night and the day, and the sun and the moon, each in an orbit, swimming.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We did not assign to any human being before you immortality. What, if you [are fated to] die, will they be immortal?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Every soul shall taste death, and We will try you with ill and good as an ordeal. And then unto Us you shall be brought back.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And whenever the disbelievers see you, they only take you in derision: 'Is this the one who mentions your gods?' And yet when it comes to the mention of the Compassionate One, they are disbelieving.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Man was created of haste. Assuredly I shall show you My signs, so do not demand that I hasten.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And they say, 'When will this promise be [fulfilled], if you are truthful?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: If those who disbelieved only knew of the time when they shall not [be able to] ward off the Fire from their faces, nor from their backs, nor shall they be helped.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Nay, but it shall come upon them suddenly, dumbfounding them, and they shall not be able to ward it off, nor shall they be granted any respite.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And verily messengers before you were derided, but those who mocked them were encircled by that which they used to deride.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Say: 'Who can guard you by night and day from the Compassionate One?' Nay, but of the Remembrance of their Lord they are disregardful.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Or is it that they have gods to defend them besides Us? They cannot help themselves, nor shall they be protected from Us.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Nay, but We provided [comforts] for these and their fathers until life lasted long for them. Do they not see how We visit the land, diminishing it at its edges? Are they the ones who will prevail?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Say: 'I warn you only by the Revelation'. But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And if a whiff of your Lord's chastisement were to touch them, they would indeed say, 'O woe for us! Truly we were doing evil'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We shall set up the just balances for the Day of Resurrection and no soul shall be wronged in any way; and even if it, be the weight of a [single] mustard seed, We shall produce it, and We suffice as reckoners.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And verily We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, and an illumination, and remembrance for those who are wary of God,

Name: The Prophets
Verse: those who fear their Lord in concealment, and who, on account of the Hour, are apprehensive.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And this is a blessed Remembrance which We have revealed. Will you then deny it?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And verily We had given Abraham his rectitude before, and We were Aware of him,

Name: The Prophets
Verse: when he said to his father and his people, 'What are these images to which you [constantly] cleave?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'We found our fathers worshipping them'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He said, 'Truly you and your fathers have been in manifest error'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'Do you bring us the truth, or are you being frivolous?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He said, 'Nay, but your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, [the One] Who originated them, and to that I am a witness.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And, by God, I shall devise [a stratagem] against your idols after you have gone away, with your backs turned'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And so he reduced them to fragments, [all] except the principal one among them, that they might return to it.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'Who has done this to our gods? Truly he is an evildoer'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'We heard a young man making [ill] mention of them - he is called Abraham'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'Then bring him before the people's eyes that they may testify'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'So, is it you who has done this to our gods, O Abraham?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He said, 'Rather it was this principal one among them did it. So question them, if they can speak!'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: So they turned [thinking] to themselves, and they said, 'Truly it is you who are the evildoers'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Then they were turned on their heads, [and said], 'You are certainly aware that these [idols] cannot speak'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: He said, 'Do you then worship, besides God, that which cannot benefit you in any way, nor harm you?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Fie on you and what you worship besides God. Do you not comprehend?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They said, 'Burn him and stand by your gods, if you are to do anything'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: We said, 'O fire! Be coolness and safety for Abraham!'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And they sought to outwit him, but We made them the greater losers.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We delivered him, as well as Lot [and brought them] to the land which We have blessed for all peoples.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We gave him Isaac, and Jacob as a gift; and each of them We made righteous.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We made them leaders, guiding by Our command, and We inspired in them the performance of good deeds and the maintenance of prayers and the payment of alms, and they used to worship Us.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge; and We delivered him from the town which had been committing vileness. Truly they were a folk of evil [people], immoral.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We admitted him into Our mercy. He was indeed one of the righteous.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And Noah, when he called before. And We responded to him, and delivered him and his people from the great agony.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We helped him against the people who denied Our signs. They were indeed an evil people, so We drowned them all.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And David and Solomon, when they gave judgement concerning the tillage, when the sheep of a [certain] people strayed into it; and We were witnesses to their judgement.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We gave understanding of this to Solomon. And to each We gave judgement and knowledge. And We disposed the mountains to glorify [God] with David, and the birds also. And We were [certainly] doers [thereof].

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We taught him the art of making garments for you to protect you against your [mutual] violence. Will you then be thankful?

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And [we subdued] for Solomon the wind to blow strongly - making its way, at his command, to the land which We have blessed; and We have knowledge of all things.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And [we subdued] of the devils some that dived for him and performed tasks other than that. And We were watchful over them.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And Job, when he called out to his Lord: 'Indeed harm has befallen me, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: So We responded to him, and removed the harm that had befallen him, and We gave him [back] his family, along with them [other children] the like of them, as a mercy from Us and a reminder to worshippers.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And Ishmael and Idrīs and Dhū’l-Kifl — all were of the patient.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed they were among the worthy.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And Dhū’l-Nūn, when he went off enraged thinking that We had no power over him. Then he cried out in the darknesses: ‘There is no god except You! Glory be to You! I have indeed been one of the wrongdoers’.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: So We responded to him and delivered him from the distress, and thus We deliver the believers.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And Zachariah when he cried out to his Lord: 'My Lord, do not leave me without an heir, and You are the best of inheritors'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: So We responded to him, and gave him John, and We restored [fertility to] his wife for him. Truly they would hasten to good works, and supplicate Us out of desire and in awe, and they were submissive before Us.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And the one who guarded her virginity, so We breathed into her of Our spirit. And We made her and her son a sign for all the worlds.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: 'Truly this is your community, one community, and I am your Lord, so worship Me'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: But they fragmented their affair among themselves; all shall return to Us.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And whoever performs righteous deeds, being a believer - no rejection will there be of his endeavour, and We will indeed write it down for him.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: It is forbidden for any town which We have destroyed that they should return.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Until when Gog and Magog are let loose and they slide down from every slope.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: And the true promise draws near and behold the gaze of the disbelievers will be fixed: 'O woe to us! Verily, we were oblivious to this. Nay, but we were doing wrong'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: 'Truly you and what you worship besides God shall be fuel for Hell; and you shall come to it'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Had these been gods, they would never have come to it, and they will all abide therein.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: For them there will be groaning therein and they will not hear in it.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Indeed those to whom [the promise of] the best reward went beforehand from Us, they will be kept away from it.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: They will not hear the faintest sound from it and they will abide in what their souls desired.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: The Supreme Terror shall not grieve them, and the angels shall receive them: 'This is your day, the one which you were promised'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: The day when We shall roll up the heaven as the Scribe rolls up the written scroll. As We began the first creation, We shall repeat it - a promise binding on Us. Truly We shall do [that].

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Certainly We wrote in the Scripture after the Remembrance: 'Indeed the land shall be inherited by My righteous servants'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Indeed there is in this a proclamation for a people who are devout.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: We did not send you, except as a mercy to all the worlds.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Say: 'All that is being revealed to me is that your God is One God. So will you submit?'

Name: The Prophets
Verse: But if they turn away, say: 'I have proclaimed to you all alike, although I do not know whether near or far is that which you have been promised'.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Indeed He knows whatever is spoken aloud and He knows what you conceal.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: I do not know; perhaps that may be a trial for you and an enjoyment for a while.

Name: The Prophets
Verse: Say: ’My Lord! Judge with truth. And our Lord is the Compassionate One, Whose help is to be sought against what you allege’.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: O mankind, fear your Lord. Surely the earthquake of the Hour [of Doom] is a tremendous thing.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: On the day when you behold it, every nursing female will neglect her suckling, and every pregnant female will deliver her burden, and you will see mankind [as though] drunk, yet they will not be drunk, but God's chastisement is severe.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And among mankind are those who dispute about God without any knowledge and [those who] follow every rebellious devil

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: about whom it has been decreed that whoever takes him for a friend, he will make him go astray and will lead him to the chastisement of the Blaze.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: O mankind, if you are in doubt about the Resurrection, then lo! [consider that] We have created you from dust then, from a drop, then from a clot, then from a [little] lump of flesh, partly formed, and partly unformed, that We may make clear to you. And We establish in the wombs whatever We will for a specified time, then We bring you forth as infants, and then that you may come of age. And there are some of you who are taken away, and there are some of you who are relegated to the most abject time of life, so that after [having had] some knowledge, he no longer knows anything. And you see the earth torpid, yet when We send down water upon it, it stirs, and swells, and grows [plants of] every delightful kind.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That, is because God, He is the Truth, and because He revives the dead and has power over all things;

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: and because the Hour will come, whereof there is no doubt, and because God will resurrect those who are in the graves.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And among mankind there are some who dispute about God without [any] knowledge or guidance, or an enlightening Scripture,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: turning aside to go astray from the way of God. For him there will be ignominy in this world, and on the Day of Resurrection We shall make him taste the chastisement of the burning.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: 'That is [the chastisement] for what your hands have sent ahead, and because God is not unjust to His servants'.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And among mankind there are those who worship God on a knife-edge: if good [fortune] befalls him, he is reassured by it; but if an ordeal befalls him, he makes a turnabout, losing both this world and the Hereafter. That is the manifest loss.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: He calls on besides God that which could not hurt him, and that which could not profit him. Such is extreme error.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: He calls on him whose harm is likelier than his benefit. Truly an evil patron and an evil friend.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Truly God shall admit those who believe and perform righteous deeds into gardens underneath which rivers flow. Indeed God does whatever He desires.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Whoever supposes that God will not help him in this world and the Hereafter, let him extend a rope to the ceiling, and let him hang himself. Then let him see whether his strategy dispels that which enrages him.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: So, We revealed it as clear signs, and indeed God guides whomever He desires.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Truly those who believe, and those of Jewry, and the Sabaeans, and the Christians, and the Magians and the polytheists - God will indeed judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Assuredly God, over all things, is Witness.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Have you not seen that to God prostrate whoever is in the heavens and whoever is in the earth, together with the sun and the moon, and the stars and the mountains, and the trees and the animals, as well as many of mankind? And for many the chastisement has become due. And he whom God abases, there is none to give him honour. Indeed God does whatever He will.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: These twain are two contenders who contend concerning their Lord. As for those who disbelieve, garments of fire will be cut out for them and boiling water will be poured over their heads,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: whereby will be melted that which is in their bellies and their skins.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And there will be hooked rods of iron for them.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Whenever they desire to exit from it on account of [their] anguish, they are made to return into it, and [it will be said to them]: 'Taste the chastisement of the burning!'

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Indeed God shall admit those who believe and perform righteous deeds into gardens underneath which rivers flow; adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl and their raiment therein will be silk.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And they shall be guided to wholesome words, and they shall be guided to the path of the Praised.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Truly those who disbelieve, and who bar from the way of God and the Sacred Mosque, which We have assigned for mankind, equally for the dweller therein and the visitor; and whoever seeks [to commit] sacrilege therein by doing wrong, We shall make him taste a painful chastisement.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And when We settled for Abraham the site of the House, [saying]: 'Do not ascribe any partner to Me and purify My House, for those who circumambulate it and those who are resident, and those who bow and prostrate.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And announce among the people the [season for] Pilgrimage. And they shall come to you on foot, and on every lean camel. They shall come from every deep ravine,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: that they may witness things that are of benefit to them, and mention God's Name on appointed days over the livestock which He has provided them. "So eat thereof and feed the wretched poor".

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Then let them do away with their self-neglect, and let them fulfil their vows, and perform the circumambulation of the Ancient House'.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: being ?an?fs to God, not ascribing partners to Him. For whoever ascribes partners to God, it is as though he had fallen from the heaven and been snatched away by [vulture] birds, or [as though] the wind had blown him into a far-off place.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That [is his state]. And whoever venerates the sacraments of God, then that derives from the piety of the hearts.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: You may benefit from them until a specified time. Thereafter its lawful sacrifice is by the Ancient House.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And for every community, We have appointed a [holy] rite that they might mention God's Name over the livestock that He has provided them. For your God is One God, so submit to Him. And give good tidings to the humbly obedient,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: who, when God is mentioned, their hearts tremble, and who endure [patiently] whatever may befall them, and who observe prayer, and who, from that which We have provided them, expend.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And [as for] the sacrificial camels, We have appointed them for you as one of God's sacraments. There is good for you in them. So mention God's Name over them when they are lined up. Then, when their flanks have collapsed, eat of them, and feed the [self-contained] beggar and the suppliant. So We have disposed them for you that perhaps you might be thankful.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Neither their flesh nor their blood shall reach God, rather it is your piety that shall reach Him. Thus has He disposed them for you, that you may magnify God for His guiding you. And give good tidings to the virtuous.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Indeed God protects those who believe. Indeed God does not love the treacherous, the ungrateful.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Permission is granted to those who fight because they have been wronged. And God is truly able to help them;

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: those who were expelled from their homes without right, only because they said: 'Our Lord is God'. Were it not for God's causing some people to drive back others, destruction would have befallen the monasteries, and churches, and synagogues, and mosques in which God's Name is mentioned greatly. Assuredly God will help those who help Him. God is truly Strong, Mighty -

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: those who, if We empower them in the land, maintain the prayer, and pay the alms, and enjoin decency and forbid indecency. And with God rests the outcome of all matters.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And if they deny you, the people of Noah denied before them, and ‘ād, and Thamūd,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: as well as the people of Abraham, and the people of Lot,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: and the inhabitants of Midian, and Moses was also denied. And I granted the disbelievers respite, then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My abhorrence!

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: How many a town I have destroyed, while it was doing wrong, but now it lies fallen down on its roofs, and a neglected well, and a lofty palace.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Have they not travelled in the land so that they may have hearts with which to comprehend, or ears with which to hear? Indeed it is not the eyes that turn blind, but it is the hearts that turn blind within the breasts.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And they ask you to hasten the chastisement, even though God would never break His promise. And truly a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of your counting.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: To how many a town did I give respite while it was doing wrong; [but] then I seized it, and with Me lies the journey's end.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Say: 'O mankind, I am only a manifest warner to you'.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And so those who believe and perform righteous deeds - for them there shall be forgiveness and a glorious provision.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: But those who strive against Our signs, seeking to incapacitate - those, they shall be the inhabitants of hell-fire.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet but that when he recited [the scripture] Satan cast into his recitation. Thereat God abrogates, whatever Satan had cast, then God confirms His revelations. And God is Knower, Wise.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That He may make what Satan has cast a trial for those in whose hearts is a sickness and those whose hearts are hardened. For truly the evildoers are [steeped] in extreme defiance.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And that those who have been given knowledge, may know that it is the truth from your Lord, so that they may believe therein, and their hearts may find reassurance in it. And assuredly God guides those who believe to a straight path.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it, until the Hour comes upon them unawares, or there come upon them the chastisement of a day of desolation.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Sovereignty on that day will be God's. He will judge between them. Then those who believed and performed righteous deeds will be in Gardens of Bliss,

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: while those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, for them will be a humiliating chastisement.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And those who emigrated in the way of God, and then were slain, or died, God shall provide them with a good provision. Truly God is the best of providers.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Assuredly He will admit them into a place. And truly God is Knowing, Forbearing.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That [is so]. And whoever retaliates with the like of what he was made to suffer, and then is [again] made to suffer aggression, God will surely help him. Indeed God is Pardoning, Forgiving.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That is because God makes the night pass into the day and makes the day pass into the night, and because God is Hearer, Seer.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: That is because God, He is the Truth, and what they call on besides Him, that is the False, and because God, He is the High, the Great.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Have you not seen that God sends down water from the heaven whereupon the earth turns green. Indeed God is Subtle, Aware.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. Surely God, He is Independent, Praiseworthy.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Have you not seen that God has disposed for you all that is in the earth, and [that] the ships run upon the sea by His command, and He holds back the heaven lest it should fall on the earth, save [when it may do so] by His leave. Surely God is, with mankind, Gentle, Merciful.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And He it is Who gave you life, then He will cause you to die, then He will give you life [again]. Truly man is very ungrateful.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: For every community We have appointed a [holy] rite which they are to observe. So do not let them dispute with you about the matter, but summon [people] to your Lord. Indeed you follow a straight guidance.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And if they dispute with you, say: 'God knows best what you do.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: God will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein you used to differ'.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: Do you not know that God knows all that is in the heaven and the earth? Truly that is [recorded] in a Book. Indeed that is easy for God.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And they worship besides God that for which He has never revealed any warrant, and that of which they have no knowledge. And those who do evil shall have no helper.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And when Our signs are recited to them, [though they are] clear signs, you perceive on the faces of those who disbelieve denial. They would almost pounce upon those who recite Our signs to them. Say: 'Shall I inform you about something worse than that? The Fire! God has promised it to the disbelievers. And it is an evil journey's end!'

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: O mankind, a similitude is being struck, so listen to it: truly those on whom you call besides God will never create a fly even if they rallied together to do so. And if a fly should take away something from them, they would not be able to recover that from it. Feeble is the seeker and the [thing] sought.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: They do not esteem God with the esteem He deserves. Truly God is Strong, Mighty.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: God chooses from the angels messengers and [also chooses] from mankind. Truly God is Hearer, Seer.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: He knows that which is before them and that which is behind them, and to God all matters are returned.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: O you who believe, bow down and prostrate yourselves, and worship your Lord, and do good that perhaps you may be prosperous.

Name: The Pilgrimage
Verse: And struggle in the way of God, a struggle worthy of Him. He has elected you, and has not laid upon you in your religion any hardship - the creed of your father Abraham [is yours]. He named you Muslims before, and in this, so that the Messenger might be a witness against you, and that you might be witnesses against mankind. So maintain prayer, and pay the alms, and hold fast to God. He is your Patron. An excellent Patron and an excellent Helper.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Indeed prosperous are the believers,

Name: The Believers
Verse: those who in their prayers are humble,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who shun vain talk,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who fulfil payment of alms,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who guard their private parts,

Name: The Believers
Verse: except from their spouses, and what [slaves] their right hands possess, for then they are not blameworthy.

Name: The Believers
Verse: But whoever seeks [anything] beyond that, those, they are transgressors.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And who are keepers of their trusts and covenants.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And who are watchful of their prayers.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Those, they are the inheritors

Name: The Believers
Verse: who shall inherit Paradise, wherein they will abide.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We certainly created man from an extraction of clay.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then We made him a drop in a secure lodging.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then We transformed the drop [of semen] into a clot. Then We transformed the clot into a [little] lump of flesh. Then We transformed the lump of flesh into bones. Then We clothed the bones with flesh. Then We produced him as [yet] another creature. So blessed be God, the best of creators!

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then indeed after that you die.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then on the Day of Resurrection you shall surely be raised.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And verily We created above you seven paths, and of creation We are never unmindful.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We sent down water out of the heaven in measure, and We lodged it within the earth; and We are indeed able to take it away.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then We produced for you therewith gardens of date palms and vines wherein is abundant fruit for you, and whereof you eat.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And a tree that grows on Mount of Sinai that produces oil and seasoning for those who eat.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And surely in the cattle there is for you a lesson. We give you to drink of what is in their bellies, and you have many uses in them, and you eat of them.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And on them and on ships you are carried.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And verily We sent Noah to his people, and he said, 'O my people, worship God. You have no [other] god besides Him. Will you not then fear?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: But the council of his people, who disbelieved, said, 'This is just a human being like you who desires to gain superiority over you. And had God willed, He would have sent down angels. We never heard of such among our forefathers.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He is just a man possessed by madness. So bear with him for a while'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He said, 'My Lord, help me because they deny me'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: So We revealed to him [saying], 'Build the Ark under Our watch and [by] Our revelation. Then, when Our command comes, and the oven gushes, bring into it of every kind [of animal] two mates, together with your family, except for those against whom the Word has already gone forth. And do not plead with Me concerning those who have done wrong. They shall indeed be drowned.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And when you have settled in the Ark together with those with you, say, "Praise be to God Who has delivered us from the wrongdoing folk".

Name: The Believers
Verse: And say: "My Lord, cause me to land with a landing blessed, for You are the best of all who bring to land" '.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Surely in that there are signs, and indeed We were putting to the test.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then, after them, We brought forth another generation.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We sent among them a messenger of their own, saying, 'Worship God! You have no other god besides Him. Will you not then be wary?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: The council of his people, who disbelieved and denied the encounter of the Hereafter, and whom We had given affluence in the life of this world, said: 'This is only a human being like you: he eats what you eat and drinks what you drink.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And if you obey a human being like yourselves you will surely then be losers.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones, you shall be brought forth?

Name: The Believers
Verse: Far-fetched, far-fetched is what you are promised!

Name: The Believers
Verse: There is nothing but our life in this world: we die, and we live, and we shall not be raised [again].

Name: The Believers
Verse: He is just a man who has invented a lie against God, and we will not believe in him'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He said, 'My Lord, help me because they have denied me'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He said, 'In a little while they will become remorseful'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: So the Cry seized them rightfully, and We made them as husks. So a far removal for the evildoing folk.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then, after them, We brought forth other generations.

Name: The Believers
Verse: No community can precede its term, nor be deferred.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then sent We Our messengers successively. Whenever there came to a community its messenger they denied him; so We made them follow one another, and We turned them into folktales. So away with a people who do not believe!

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a manifest warrant

Name: The Believers
Verse: to Pharaoh and his council; but they disdained, and they were a tyrannical folk.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And they said, 'Shall we believe two humans like ourselves, while their people are servile to us?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: So they denied them [both] and became of those who were destroyed.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And verily We gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they might be guided.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign. And We gave them refuge on a height level and watered by springs.

Name: The Believers
Verse: O messengers, eat of the good things and perform righteous acts. Surely I know what you do.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Verily this your community is one community and I am your Lord, so fear Me'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: But they split into sects regarding their affair, each party rejoicing in what is with them.

Name: The Believers
Verse: So leave them in their error for a while.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Do they suppose that in the wealth and children with which We provide them,

Name: The Believers
Verse: We are hastening to [provide] them with good things? Rather, they are not aware.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Surely those who, for fear of their Lord, are apprehensive,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who believe in the signs of their Lord,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who do not associate others with their Lord,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and who give what they give, while their hearts tremble [with awe], because they are going to return to their Lord -

Name: The Believers
Verse: those [are the ones who] hasten to [perform] good works, and they [are the ones who] shall come out ahead in them.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We do not task any soul beyond its capacity, and with Us is a Record that speaks the truth; and they will not be wronged.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Nay, but their hearts are in ignorance of this, and they have other deeds which they will perpetrate, besides, which they are doing.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Indeed when We seize their affluent ones with chastisement, behold! They are supplicating loudly.

Name: The Believers
Verse: 'Do not supplicate [out loud] on this day! Truly you will not receive help against Us.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Verily My signs used to be recited to you, but you used to take to your heels,

Name: The Believers
Verse: disdainful because of it, while in [your] night sessions you talked nonsense'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Have they not contemplated the discourse, or has there come upon them that which has not come upon their forefathers?

Name: The Believers
Verse: Or is it that they do not recognise their [own] Messenger and so they reject him?

Name: The Believers
Verse: Or do they say, 'There is a madness in him'? Nay, he has brought them the truth; but most of them are averse to the truth.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And if the truth had followed their desires, indeed the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been corrupted. Nay, We have brought them their Remembrance, but they are disregardful of their [own] Remembrance.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Or do you ask them for any recompense? Yet the recompense of your Lord is better and He is the best of providers.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And truly you summon them to a straight path.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And truly those who do not believe in the Hereafter, deviate from the path.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And had We shown them mercy and relieved them of the harm afflicting them, they would surely persist in their insolence, bewildered.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And We have already seized them with chastisement, yet they did not humble themselves to their Lord, nor did they devote themselves to prayer.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Until when We opened on them the gate of a severe chastisement, behold! they are aghast thereat.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And He it is Who made for you hearing, and eyes, and hearts. Little thanks do you show.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And He it is Who dispersed you on earth, and to Him you shall be gathered.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And He it is Who gives life and brings death, and due to Him is the alternation of night and day. Will you not then comprehend?

Name: The Believers
Verse: Nay, but they say the like of what the ancients said.

Name: The Believers
Verse: They said, 'What, when we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then be raised?

Name: The Believers
Verse: Already We and our fathers have been promised this before: these are nothing but the fables of the ancients'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Say: 'To whom does the earth and whoever is in it belong, if you [truly] knew?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: They will say, 'To God'. Say: 'Will you not then remember?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: Say: 'Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Great Throne?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: They will say, 'God'. Say: 'Will you not then be God-fearing?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: Say: 'In whose hand is the dominion of all things and who protects, while from Him there is no protection, if you know?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: They will say, 'God'. Say: 'How then are you bewitched?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: Nay, but We have brought them the truth, and they are indeed liars.

Name: The Believers
Verse: God has not taken any son, nor is there any god along with Him; for then each god would have taken away what he created, and some of them would surely rise up against others. Glorified be God above what they ascribe.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Knower of the Unseen and the visible, and exalted be He above what they associate!

Name: The Believers
Verse: Say: 'My Lord! If You should show me what they are promised,

Name: The Believers
Verse: my Lord, then do no put me among the evildoing folk'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And truly We are able to show you what We promise them.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Ward off with that which is better the evil [act]. We know best what they allege.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And say: 'My Lord, I seek protection in You from the promptings of devils.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And I seek protection in You, my Lord, lest they visit me'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Until when death comes to one of them, he says, 'My Lord! Send me back,

Name: The Believers
Verse: that I might act righteously in that which I have left behind'. By no means! It is merely a word that he speaks, and behind them there is a barrier until the day when they are raised.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And when the Trumpet is blown, there will be no more ties [of kinship] between them on that day, nor will they question one another.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Then those whose scales are heavy, they are the successful,

Name: The Believers
Verse: and those whose scales are light, they are the ones who have lost their souls, abiding in Hell.

Name: The Believers
Verse: The Fire will scorch their faces, while they glower therein:

Name: The Believers
Verse: 'Were not My signs recited to you, and you used to deny them?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: They will say, 'Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were an erring folk.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Our Lord, bring us out of it! Then, if we revert, we will indeed be evildoers'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He will say, ‘Begone in it, and do not speak to Me.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Indeed there was a party of My servants who would say, "Our Lord, we believe; therefore forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the best of the merciful".

Name: The Believers
Verse: But then you took them as an object of ridicule until they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Indeed I have rewarded them this day for the endurance they showed. They are indeed the winners'.

Name: The Believers
Verse: He will say, 'How long did you tarry in the earth in years?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: They will say, 'We tarried a day, or part of a day. Yet ask those who keep count!'

Name: The Believers
Verse: He will say, 'You tarried but a little, if only you knew.

Name: The Believers
Verse: Did you suppose that We created you aimlessly and that you would not be returned to Us?'

Name: The Believers
Verse: So exalted be God, the King, the Truth! There is no god except Him, the Lord of the Noble Throne.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And he who calls on another god along with God has no proof thereof, his reckoning will indeed be with his Lord. Truly the disbelievers will not be successful.

Name: The Believers
Verse: And say: 'My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful'.

Name: Light
Verse: A sūra which We have revealed and prescribed and wherein We have revealed manifest signs that perhaps you might remember.

Name: Light
Verse: As for the fornicatress and the fornicator, strike each of them a hundred lashes. And do not let any pity for them overcome you in God's religion, if you believe in God and the Last Day. And let their punishment be witnessed by a group of the believers.

Name: Light
Verse: The fornicator shall not marry anyone but a fornicatress or an idolatress, and the fornicatress shall be married by none except a fornicator or an idolator, and that is forbidden to believers.

Name: Light
Verse: And those who accuse honourable women [in wedlock], and then do not bring four witnesses, strike them eighty lashes, and do not accept any testimony from them ever; and those, they are the immoral,

Name: Light
Verse: except those who repent thereafter and make amends, for God is indeed Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Light
Verse: And those who accuse their wives, but have no witnesses, except themselves, then the testimony of one of them shall be to testify [swearing] by God four times that he is indeed being truthful,

Name: Light
Verse: and a fifth time that God's wrath shall be upon him if he were lying.

Name: Light
Verse: And the punishment shall be averted from her if she testify [swearing] by God four times that he is indeed lying,

Name: Light
Verse: and a fifth time that God's wrath shall be upon her if he were being truthful.

Name: Light
Verse: And were it not for God's bounty to you and His mercy, and that God is the Relenting, Wise.

Name: Light
Verse: Truly those who initiated the slander are a band from among yourselves. Do not suppose that it is bad for you; rather it is good for you. Upon every man of them shall be the [onus of the] sin which he has earned, and as for him who bore the greater share thereof, there will be an awful chastisement for him.

Name: Light
Verse: Why, when you [first] heard about it, did the believing men and women not think good of themselves, and say, 'This is a manifest calumny?'

Name: Light
Verse: Why did they not produce four witnesses to it? And since they did not produce the witnesses, those, in God's sight, they are liars.

Name: Light
Verse: And were it not for God's bounty to you and His mercy in the life of this world and the Hereafter there would have befallen you, for what you engaged in, an awful chastisement,

Name: Light
Verse: when you were receiving it [welcomingly] with your tongues, and were uttering with your mouths that whereof you had no knowledge, supposing it to be a light matter, while with God it was grave.

Name: Light
Verse: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, 'It is not for us to speak about this. Glory be to You! This is an awful calumny?'

Name: Light
Verse: God admonishes you, lest you should ever repeat the like of it, if you are [in truth] believers.

Name: Light
Verse: And God clarifies for you the signs, and God is Knower, Wise.

Name: Light
Verse: Truly those who love that indecency should be spread, concerning those who believe, theirs will be a painful chastisement in the life of this world and the Hereafter, and God knows, and you do not know.

Name: Light
Verse: And were it not for God's bounty to you, and His mercy and that God is Gentle, Merciful.

Name: Light
Verse: O you who believe, do not follow in the steps of Satan. For whoever follows in the steps of Satan, assuredly he enjoins indecency and what is reprehensible. And were it not for God's bounty to you and His mercy not one of you would ever have grown pure. But God purifies whom He will, and God is Hearer, Knower.

Name: Light
Verse: And do not let those of you who possess bounty and the affluent swear not to give to the near of kin and the poor and those who emigrate in the way of God. Let them forgive and excuse. Do you not love that God should forgive you? And God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Light
Verse: Truly those who make accusations against honourably married women who are unaware and who believe, shall be cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and there will be an awful chastisement for them

Name: Light
Verse: on the day when their tongues and their hands and their feet shall testify against them concerning what they used to do.

Name: Light
Verse: On that day God will pay them in full their just due, and they shall know that God is the Manifest Truth.

Name: Light
Verse: Vile women are for vile men, and vile men for vile women. Good women are for good men, and good men for good women - such are absolved of what they say. For them will be forgiveness and a glorious provision.

Name: Light
Verse: O you who believe, do not enter houses other than your houses until you have [first] asked permission and greeted their occupants. That is better for you that perhaps you might remember.

Name: Light
Verse: And if you do not find anyone in them, [still] do not enter them until permission has been given to you. And if it is said to you, 'Go away', then go away, for this is purer for you. And God knows what you do.

Name: Light
Verse: You would not be at fault if you enter [without permission] uninhabited houses wherein is comfort for you. And God knows what you disclose and what you hide.

Name: Light
Verse: Tell believing men to lower their gaze and to guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Truly God is Aware of what they do.

Name: Light
Verse: And tell believing women to lower their gaze and to guard their private parts, and not to display their adornment except for what is apparent, and let them draw their veils over their bosoms and not reveal their adornment, except to their husbands or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or what their right hands own, or such men who are dependant, not possessing any sexual desire, or children who are not yet aware of women's private parts. And do not let them thump with their feet to make known their hidden ornaments. And rally to God in repentance, O believers, so that you might be prosperous.

Name: Light
Verse: And marry off the spouseless among you and the righteous ones among your male slaves and your female slaves. If they are poor, God will enrich them out of His bounty. God is Embracing, Knowing.

Name: Light
Verse: And let those who cannot find the means to marry be continent, until God enriches them out of His bounty. And those who seek a written contract [of emancipation], from among those whom your right hand owns, contract with them accordingly, if you know in them any good, and give them out of the wealth of God which He has given you. And do not compel your slave-girls to prostitution when they desire to be chaste, that you may seek the transient things of the life of this world. And should anyone compel them, then surely God, after their compulsion, will be Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Light
Verse: And verily We have revealed to you clear verses and an example of those who passed away before you, and an admonition for those who fear God.

Name: Light
Verse: God is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The likeness of His Light is as a niche wherein is a lamp. The lamp is in a glass, the glass as it were a glittering star kindled from a Blessed Tree, an olive neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow forth [of itself], though no fire touched it. Light upon light. God guides to His Light whom He will. And God strikes similitudes for men; and God is Knower of all things.

Name: Light
Verse: In houses [whose status] God has allowed to be raised, and wherein His Name is remembered, therein [they] make glorifications to Him in the mornings and the evenings,

Name: Light
Verse: men whom neither trading, nor sale distracts from the remembrance of God and the observance of prayer and payment of the alms. They fear a day when hearts and eyes will be tossed about,

Name: Light
Verse: so that God may reward them for the best of what they did, and give them more out of His bounty; and God provides whomever He will without [any] reckoning.

Name: Light
Verse: And as for those who disbelieve, their works are like a mirage in a plain which the thirsty man supposes to be water until he comes to it and finds it to be nothing, and he finds God there, Who pays him his account in full; and God is swift at reckoning.

Name: Light
Verse: Or as the manifold darkness on a deep sea, covered by a billow, above which there is [another] billow, above which there are clouds, manifold [layers of] darkness, one on top of another. When he holds out his hand, he can scarcely see it. And he whom God has not granted any light has no light.

Name: Light
Verse: Have you not seen that God is glorified by all who are in the heavens and the earth, and the birds spreading their wings? Of each [one of them] He verily knows its prayer and its glorification; and God knows what they do.

Name: Light
Verse: And to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and with God is the journey's end.

Name: Light
Verse: Have you not seen how God drives the clouds, then composes them, then piles them up, whereat you see the rain issuing from the midst of them? And He sends down from the heaven out of the mountains that are therein hail, and smites with it whom He will and turns it away from whom He will. The brilliance of its lightning would almost take away the eyes.

Name: Light
Verse: God alternates the night and the day. Surely in that there is a lesson for those who see.

Name: Light
Verse: And God has created every beast from fluid. Among them are some that creep upon their bellies, and among them are some that walk on two feet, and among them are some that walk on four. God creates whatever He will. Truly God has power over all things.

Name: Light
Verse: And verily We have revealed manifest signs, and God guides whomever He will to a straight path.

Name: Light
Verse: And they say, 'We believe in God and the Messenger, and we obey'. Then after that a party of them turn away, and those, they are not believers.

Name: Light
Verse: And when they are summoned to God and His Messenger, that he may judge between them, behold, a party of them are averse.

Name: Light
Verse: But if right be on their side they would come to him willingly.

Name: Light
Verse: Is there a sickness in their hearts? Or are they in doubt, or do they fear that God and His Messenger will be unjust to them? Rather, those, they are the wrongdoers.

Name: Light
Verse: All that the believers say, when they are summoned to God and His Messenger, that he may judge between them, is that they say, 'We hear and we obey'. And those are the successful.

Name: Light
Verse: And he who obeys God and His Messenger, and fears God and fears Him, those, they are the winners.

Name: Light
Verse: And they swear by God solemn oaths that if you order them, they will surely go forth. Say, 'Do not swear! Acknowledged obedience. Surely God is Aware of what you do'.

Name: Light
Verse: Say: 'Obey God, and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away, [know that] he is only responsible for that with which he has been charged, and you are responsible for that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And the Messenger's duty is only to convey [the Message] clearly'.

Name: Light
Verse: God has promised those of you who believe and perform righteous deeds that He will surely make them successors in the earth, just as He made those who were before them successors, and He will surely establish for them their religion which He has approved for them, and that He will give them in exchange after their fear security. 'They worship Me, without associating anything with Me'. And whoever is ungrateful after that, those, they are the immoral.

Name: Light
Verse: And establish prayer and pay the alms, and obey the Messenger, that perhaps you may find mercy.

Name: Light
Verse: And do not suppose that those who disbelieve can escape in the land. For their abode will be the Fire, and it is surely an evil destination.

Name: Light
Verse: O you who believe, let those whom your right hands own, and those of you who have not reached puberty, ask leave of you three times: before the dawn prayer, and when you put off your garments at noon, and after the night prayer. [These are] three periods of privacy for you. Neither you nor they would be at fault at other times; they frequent you [as] some of you [do] with others. So God clarifies for you the signs; and God is Knower, Wise.

Name: Light
Verse: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them seek permission, just as those sought permission before them. So God clarifies His signs for you, and God is Knower, Wise.

Name: Light
Verse: And as for menopausal women who do not expect to marry, they would not be at fault if they put off their clothes in such a way as not to display adornment; but to refrain [from doing so] is better for them; and God is Hearer, Knower.

Name: Light
Verse: There is no blame upon the blind, nor any blame upon the lame, nor any blame upon the sick, nor upon yourselves if you eat from your own houses, or your fathers' houses, or your mothers' houses, or your brothers' houses, or your sisters' houses, or the houses of your paternal uncles or the houses of your paternal aunts, or the houses of your maternal uncles or the houses of your maternal aunts, or [from] that whereof you hold the keys, or [from] those of your [faithful] friends. You would not be at fault whether you eat together, or separately. But when you enter houses, bid peace to yourselves with a salutation from God, blessed and good. So God clarifies the signs for you that perhaps you might comprehend.

Name: Light
Verse: Only they are believers who believe in God and His Messenger and who, when they are with him in a collective affair do not leave until they have asked leave of him. Truly those who ask leave of you - it is they who believe in God and His Messenger. So when they ask leave of you for some affair, of theirs, give permission to whom you will of them, and ask God to forgive them. Truly God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Light
Verse: Do not, among yourselves, consider the calling of the Messenger to be like your calling of one another. Verily God knows those of you who slip away surreptitiously. So let those who contravene His command beware lest an ordeal befall them, or there befall them a painful chastisement.

Name: Light
Verse: Lo! surely to God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. He is ever aware of how you are behaving and the day when they shall be returned to Him. He will inform them of what they did, and God is Knower of all things.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Blessed is He Who revealed the Criterion to His servant that he may be to all the worlds a warner.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: He to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and Who has not taken a son, nor has He any partner in sovereignty; and He created everything, and then determined it in a precise measure.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Yet they have taken besides Him gods, who create nothing but have themselves been created, and who possess no harm for themselves, nor any benefit, nor do they possess [any power over] death or life, or resurrection.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And those who disbelieve say, 'This is nothing but a calumny that he has invented, and other folk have helped him with it'. Verily thus they have committed wrong and [spoken] falsehood.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And they say, 'Fables of the ancients which he has had written down so that they are read to him morning and evening'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Say: 'It has been revealed by Him Who knows the secret of the heavens and the earth. Truly He is ever Forgiving, Merciful'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And they also say, 'What is it with this Messenger that he eats food and walks about in the marketplaces? Why has an angel not been sent down to him so as to be a warner along with him?

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Or [why is it not] a treasure thrown down to him, or [why has he not] a garden for him to eat from?' The wrongdoers say, 'You are just following a man bewitched!'

Name: The Criterion
Verse: See how they strike similitudes for you, so that they go astray and are unable to find a way.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Blessed is He Who, if He will, will give you better than that — gardens underneath which rivers flow, and will give you palaces.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Nay, but they deny the [coming of the] Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a blaze.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: When it sees them from a distant place, they will hear it raging and roaring.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And when they are flung into a narrow place thereof bound together, they will at that point pray for [their own] annihilation.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: 'Do not pray for a single annihilation on this day, but pray for many annihilations!'

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Say: 'Is that better, or the Garden of Immortality which has been promised to the God-fearing, which will be their requital and journey's end?'

Name: The Criterion
Verse: In it they shall have what they wish, abiding [therein] - it is a promise binding on your Lord, [a promise] much besought.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And on the day when He will assemble them and that which they worship besides God, and will say, 'Was it you who misled these servants of Mine, or did they go astray from the way?

Name: The Criterion
Verse: They will say, 'Glory be to You! It was not for us to take any guardians besides You. But You gave them and their fathers ease [of living] until they forgot the Remembrance and became a lost folk'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Thus they will deny you in what you allege, and they will neither be able to circumvent, nor help. And whoever of you does evil, We shall make him taste an awful chastisement.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And We did not send before you any messengers but that they ate food and walked in the marketplaces. And We have made some of you a trial for others: Will you be steadfast? And your Lord is ever Watchful.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And those who do not expect to encounter Us say, 'Why have the angels not been sent down to us, or why do we not see our Lord?' Assuredly they are full of arrogance within their souls and have become terribly insolent.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: The day when they see the angels, there will be no good tidings on that day for the guilty, and they will say, 'A forbidding ban!'

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And We shall attend to the works they did and turn them into scattered dust.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Those who will be the inhabitants of Paradise on that day will be in a [far] better abode, and a [far] better resting place.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And on the day when the heaven will be split asunder with the clouds, and the angels will be sent down in a [majestic] descent,

Name: The Criterion
Verse: true Sovereignty on that day will belong to the Compassionate One, and it will be a hard day for the disbelievers.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And [it will be] a day when the wrongdoer will bite his hands, saying, 'O would that I had followed a way with the Messenger!

Name: The Criterion
Verse: O Woe is me! Would that I had not taken so and so as friend!

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Verily he has led me astray from the Remembrance after it had come to me: And Satan is ever a deserter of man'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And the Messenger says, ‘O my Lord, lo! my people consider this Qur’ān as something to be shunned’.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: So We have appointed to every prophet an enemy from among the guilty, but your Lord suffices as a Guide and a Helper.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And those who disbelieve say, ‘Why has the Qur’ān not been revealed to him all at once?’ Thus, [it is], that We may strengthen your inner-heart with it, and We have arranged it in a specific order.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And they do not bring you any similitude, but that We bring you the truth, and [what is] better [as] exposition.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Those who will be gathered on their faces toward Hell: they will be in the worst place and furthest astray from the way.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And verily We gave Moses the Scripture, and made Aaron, his brother, [go] with him as a minister.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Then We said, 'Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs'. Then We destroyed them utterly.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And the people of Noah, when they denied the messengers - We drowned them and made them a sign for mankind, and We have prepared for the evildoers a painful chastisement.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And ‘ād and Thamūd, and the dwellers at al-Rass, and many generations in between.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: For each [of them] We struck similitudes, and each [of them] We ruined utterly.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And verily they will have passed by the town on which an evil shower was rained. Can it be that they have not seen it? Nay, but it is that they do not expect resurrection.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And when they see you, they take you in mockery only, 'Is this the one whom God has sent as a messenger?

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Indeed he was about to lead us astray from our gods, had we not stood by them'. And soon they will know, when they behold the chastisement, who is further astray from the way.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Have you seen him who has taken as his god his own desire? Will you be a guardian over him?

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Or do you suppose that most of them listen or comprehend? They are but as the cattle - nay, but they are further astray from the way.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Have you not seen your Lord, how He extends the [twilight] shadow? For had He willed, He would have made it still. Then We made the sun an indicator of it.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Then We retract it to Us by gentle retraction.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And He it is Who made for you the night as a garment, and sleep for repose, and He made the day for rising.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And He it is Who sends forth the winds dispersing before His mercy, and We send down from the heaven purifying water

Name: The Criterion
Verse: with which We revive a dead land and We give it as drink to the many cattle and humans We have created.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And verily We have distributed it among them, so that they may remember. But most people are only intent on ingratitude.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And had We willed, We could have sent forth in every town a warner.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: So do not obey the disbelievers, but struggle against them therewith with a great endeavour.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And He it is Who merged the two seas: this one palatable, sweet, and the other saltish, bitter; and He set between the two an isthmus, and a forbidding ban.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And He it is Who created man from water, and made for him ties of blood and ties of marriage. For your Lord is ever Powerful.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And they worship besides God that which neither benefits them, nor harms them; and the disbeliever is ever a partisan against his Lord.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And We have not sent you except as a bearer of good tidings, and as a warner.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Say: 'I do not ask of you in return for this any reward, except that whoever wishes to follow a way to his Lord [should do so]'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And put your trust in the Living One Who does not die, and make glorifications in His praise. And He suffices as One Aware of the sins of His servants.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Who created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in six days, then presided upon the Throne. The Compassionate One. So ask about Him anyone who is well aware.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And when it is said to them, 'Prostrate yourselves before the Compassionate One', they say, 'And what is the Compassionate One? Should we prostrate ourselves to whatever you bid us?' And it increases their aversion.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Blessed is He Who has placed in the heaven constellations and has placed in it a lamp and a shining moon.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And He it is Who made the night and day [to appear] in succession for him who desires to remember or desires to be thankful.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And the [true] servants of the Compassionate One are those who walk upon the earth modestly, and who, when the ignorant address them, say [words of] peace;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and who spend the night before their Lord, prostrating and standing [in worship],

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and who say, 'Our Lord, avert from us from the chastisement of Hell. Truly its chastisement is abiding.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: It is truly a wretched abode and residence!'

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And who, when they expend, are neither prodigal nor parsimonious; but between such lies moderation;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and [those] who do not call on another god along with God, nor slay the soul which God has forbidden, except with due cause, and who do not commit fornication - for whoever does that shall meet with retribution;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: doubled will be the chastisement for him on the Day of Resurrection and he will abide therein abased;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: except for him who repents, and believes, and acts righteously, for such, God will replace their evil deeds with good deeds, for God is ever Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: And whoever repents and acts righteously, indeed turns to God with due repentance;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and those who do not give false testimony, and, when they come across senseless talk, they pass by with dignity;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and those who, when they are reminded of the revelations of their Lord, do not fall on them deaf and blind;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: and those who say, 'Our Lord! Grant us in our spouses and our offspring a joyful sight, and make us paragons for the God-fearing'.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Those, they will be rewarded with the sublime abode, forasmuch as they were steadfast, and they will be met therein with a greeting and [words of] peace;

Name: The Criterion
Verse: abiding therein. Excellent is it as an abode and station.

Name: The Criterion
Verse: Say, 'My Lord would not be concerned with you were it not for your supplications. But you have denied, and so that will remain binding'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Tā sīn mīm.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Those are the signs of the Manifest Book.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Perhaps, you might kill yourself that they will not become believers.

Name: The Poets
Verse: If We will We will send down to them a sign from the heaven before which their necks will remain bowed in humility.

Name: The Poets
Verse: And there would never come to them from the Compassionate One any remembrance that is new, but that they used to disregard it.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Verily then they have denied; but soon there will come to them the news of that which they used to deride.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Have they not contemplated the earth, how many We have caused to grow therein of every splendid kind [of vegetation].

Name: The Poets
Verse: Surely in that there is a sign, but most of them are not believers.

Name: The Poets
Verse: And surely your Lord, He is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

Name: The Poets
Verse: And when your Lord called to Moses, [saying]: 'Go to the wrongdoing folk,

Name: The Poets
Verse: Pharaoh's folk, will they not show fear?'

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'My Lord, I fear they will deny me,

Name: The Poets
Verse: and that anguish will constrain my breast, and that my tongue will not utter clearly. So give the Mission to Aaron.

Name: The Poets
Verse: And I have sinned against them and I fear they will slay me'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Said He, 'Certainly not! Go both of you with Our signs. We will indeed be with you, hearing.

Name: The Poets
Verse: So the two of you approach Pharaoh and say, "Indeed We are the Messenger of the Lord of the Worlds,

Name: The Poets
Verse: that you should let go forth with us the Children of Israel" '.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'Did we not rear you among us as a child, and did you not stay with us for years of your life?

Name: The Poets
Verse: And you committed that deed of yours being an ingrate'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'I did that then, when I was astray.

Name: The Poets
Verse: So I fled from you, as I was afraid of you. Then my Lord gave me judgement and made me one of the messengers.

Name: The Poets
Verse: That is a favour with which you now reproach me that you have enslaved the Children of Israel'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Pharaoh said, 'And what is "the Lord of the Worlds?" '

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them should you have conviction'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said to those who were around him, 'Did you not hear?!'

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'Your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'Verily this messenger of yours sent to you is a madman!'

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'The Lord of the east and the west and all that is between them - should you comprehend'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'If you choose any god other than me, I will surely make you a prisoner!'

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'What if I bring you something manifest?'

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said, 'Then bring it, if you are truthful'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: So he threw down his staff, and lo! it was a manifest serpent.

Name: The Poets
Verse: Then he drew out his hand and lo! it was white before the onlookers.

Name: The Poets
Verse: He said to the council around him, 'Surely this man is a cunning sorcerer,

Name: The Poets
Verse: who seeks to expel you from your land by his sorcery. So what do you advise?'

Name: The Poets
Verse: They said, 'Put him and his brother off for a while and send musterers into the cities

Name: The Poets
Verse: to bring you every cunning sorcerer'.

Name: The Poets
Verse: So the sorcerers were assembled at a fixed time of a known day.

Name: The Poets
