Verse: Lo! there you are those who are being called to expend in the way of God; yet among you there are those who are niggardly; and whoever is niggardly is niggardly only to his own soul. For God is the Independent One, while you are the needy. And if you turn away, He will replace you with another people, and they will not be the likes of you.

Name: Victory
Verse: Verily We have given you a clear victory,

Name: Victory
Verse: that God may forgive you what is past of your sin and what is to come, and that He may perfect His favour to you and guide you to a straight path,

Name: Victory
Verse: and that God may grant you a mighty victory.

Name: Victory
Verse: He it is Who sent down the spirit of Peace into the hearts of the believers, that they might add faith to their faith. And to God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth. And God is ever Knower, Wise;

Name: Victory
Verse: so that He may admit the believing men and believing women into gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide, and that He may absolve them of their misdeeds; for that, in God’s sight, is a supreme triumph;

Name: Victory
Verse: and so that He may chastise the hypocrites, men and women, and the idolaters, men and women, and those who make evil assumptions about God. For them will be an evil turn of fortune, and God is wroth with them, and He has cursed them, and has prepared for them Hell — and it is an evil destination!

Name: Victory
Verse: And to God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth; and God is ever Mighty, Wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: Indeed We have sent you as a witness, and a bearer of good tidings, and a warner,

Name: Victory
Verse: that you may believe in God and His Messenger, and that you may support Him, and revere Him, and glorify Him morning and evening.

Name: Victory
Verse: Truly those who pledge allegiance to you, in fact pledge allegiance to God. The Hand of God is above their hands. So whoever reneges, reneges against his own soul; and whoever fulfils the covenant which he has made with God, He will give him a great reward.

Name: Victory
Verse: Those of the Bedouins who were left behind, will say to you, ‘Our possessions and our families kept us occupied. So ask forgiveness for us!’ They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say: ‘Who can avail you anything against God should He desire to cause you harm or desire to bring you benefit? Nay, but God is ever Aware of what you do.

Name: Victory
Verse: Nay, but you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that [thought] was adorned in your hearts, and you thought evil thoughts, and you were a ruined lot’.

Name: Victory
Verse: And whoever does not believe in God and His Messenger, We have prepared for the disbelievers a blaze.

Name: Victory
Verse: And to God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth: He forgives whomever He will and chastises whomever He will; and God is ever Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Victory
Verse: Those who were left behind will say, when you set forth after spoils, in order to capture them, ‘Let us follow you’. They desire to change the words of God. Say: ‘You shall never follow us! Thus has God said beforehand’. Then they will say, ‘Nay, but you are envious of us’. Nay, but they never understood, [all] except a few.

Name: Victory
Verse: Say to those of the Bedouins who were left behind: ‘You shall be called against a people possessed of great might, you shall fight them, or they will submit. So if you obey God will give you a good reward; but if you turn away like you turned away before, He will chastise you with a painful chastisement’.

Name: Victory
Verse: There is no blame on the blind, nor [is there] blame on the lame, nor [is there] blame on the sick. And whoever obeys God and His Messenger, He will admit him into gardens underneath which rivers flow; and whoever turns away, him He will chastise with a painful chastisement.

Name: Victory
Verse: Verily God was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree. And He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down the spirit of Peace upon them, and rewarded them with a near victory,

Name: Victory
Verse: and abundant spoils which they will capture, and God is ever Mighty, Wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: God has promised you abundant spoils which you will capture. So He has expedited this one for you, and withheld men’s hands from you, so that it may be a sign for the believers, and that He may guide you on a straight path;

Name: Victory
Verse: and others which you were not able to capture, God has verily encompassed these [already]. And God has power over all things.

Name: Victory
Verse: And if those who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [to flee] — then they would not have found any protector or helper.

Name: Victory
Verse: And it is He Who withheld their hands from you, and your hands from them, in the valley of Mecca after He had made you victors over them. And God is ever Seer of what you do.

Name: Victory
Verse: They are the ones who disbelieved and barred you from the Sacred Mosque, and [prevented] the offering which was detained from reaching its destination. And were it not for [some of] the believing men and believing women, whom you did not know, lest you should trample them, and thus incur sin on account of them without knowing, so that God may admit into His mercy whom He will. Had they been clearly separated, We would have surely chastised the disbelievers among them with a painful chastisement.

Name: Victory
Verse: When those who disbelieve nourished in their hearts zealotry, the zealotry of pagandom, [but] then God sent down His spirit of Peace upon His Messenger and the believers, and He made them abide by the word of God-fearing, for they were worthier of it, and deserving of it. And God is ever Knower of all things.

Name: Victory
Verse: Verily God has fulfilled the vision for His Messenger in all truth: ‘You will assuredly enter the Sacred Mosque, God willing, in safety, to shave your heads, or to shorten [your hair], without any fear’. So He knew what you did not know, and assigned [you] before that a near victory.

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth, that He may make it prevail over all religion. And God suffices as witness:

Name: Victory
Verse: Muhammad is the Messenger of God and those who are with him are hard against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing, prostrating [in worship]. They seek bounty from God and beatitude. Their mark from the effect of prostration. That is their description in the Torah and their description in the Gospel is as a seed that sends forth its shoot and strengthens it, and it grows stout and rises firmly upon its stalk, delighting the sowers, so that He may enrage the disbelievers by them. God has promised those of them who believe and perform righteous deeds, forgiveness and a great reward.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who believe, do not venture ahead of God and His Messenger, and fear God. Surely God is Hearer, Knower.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who believe, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, and do not shout words at him, as you shout to one another, lest your works should be invalidated without your being aware.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Truly those who lower their voices in the presence of God’s Messenger — they are the ones whose hearts God has tested for God-fearing. For them will be forgiveness and a great reward

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Truly those who call you from behind the apartments — most of them do not understand.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And had they been patient until you came out to them, it would have been better for them; and God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who believe, if a reprobate should come to you with some tiding, verify [it], lest you injure a folk out of ignorance; and then become remorseful of what you have perpetrated.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And know that the Messenger of God is among you. If he were to obey you in many matters, you would surely be in trouble. But God has endeared faith to you, adorning your hearts with it, and He has made odious to you disbelief and immorality and disobedience. Those they are the right-minded;

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And if two parties of believers fall to fighting, make peace between them. And if one of them aggresses against the other, fight the one which aggresses until it returns to God’s ordinance. Then, if it returns, reconcile them, and act justly. Surely God loves the just.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The believers are indeed brothers. Therefore [always] make peace between your brethren, and fear God, so that perhaps you might receive mercy.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who believe, do not let any people deride another people: who may be better than they are; nor let any women deride [other] women who may be better than they are. And do not defame one another, nor insult one another by nicknames. Evil is the name of immorality after faith! And whoever does not repent, those — they are the evildoers.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O you who believe, shun much suspicion. Indeed some suspicions are sins. And do not spy, nor backbite one another. Would any of you love to eat the flesh of his brother dead? You would abhor it. And fear God; assuredly God is Relenting, Merciful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O mankind! We have indeed created you from a male and a female, and made you nations and tribes that you may come to know one another. Truly the noblest of you in the sight of God is the most God-fearing among you. Truly God is Knower, Aware.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The Bedouins say, ‘We believe’. Say: ‘You do not believe; but rather say, “We have submitted”; for faith has not yet entered into your hearts’. Yet if you obey God and His Messenger, He will not diminish for you anything of your deeds. God is indeed Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The [true] believers are only those who believe in God and His Messenger, and then have not doubted, and who strive with their wealth and their souls for the cause of God. It is they who are sincere.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Say: ‘Do you [pretend to] inform God about your religion, when God knows all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth, and [even though] God is Knower of all things?’

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: They deem it to be a favour to you that they have submitted. Say: ‘Do not deem your submission to be a favour to me. Rather, it is God Who has done you a favour in that He has guided you to faith, if you are being sincere.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Truly God knows the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and God is Seer of what you do’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Qāf. By the glorious Qur’ān.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Nay, but they consider it odd that there should have come to them a warner from among themselves. So the disbelievers say, ‘This is an odd thing!

Name: Qâf
Verse: What! When we are dead and have become dust? That is a far-fetched return!’

Name: Qâf
Verse: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a preserving Book.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Nay, but they denied the truth, when it came to them and so they are [now] in a confounded situation.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Have they not then looked at the heaven above them, how We have built it, and adorned it, and how there are no cracks in it?

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the earth We have spread it out, and cast in it firm mountains, and caused every delightful kind to grow in it,

Name: Qâf
Verse: as an insight and a reminder for every penitent servant.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And We send down from the heaven blessed water with which We cause to grow gardens and the grain that is harvested,

Name: Qâf
Verse: and the date-palms that stand tall with piled spathes,

Name: Qâf
Verse: as provision for [Our] servants; and with it We revive a dead land. So shall be the rising.

Name: Qâf
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them and [so did] the dwellers at al-Rass and Thamūd,

Name: Qâf
Verse: and ‘ād, and Pharaoh, the brethren of Lot,

Name: Qâf
Verse: and the dwellers in the wood, and the people of Tubba’. Each denied the messengers, and so My threat became due.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Were We then wearied by the first creation? Nay, yet they are in doubt about a new creation.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And verily We created man and We know what his soul whispers to him, and We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

Name: Qâf
Verse: When the two Receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left,

Name: Qâf
Verse: he does not utter a word but that there is beside him a watcher, [who is] ready.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the agony of death arrives with the truth. That is what you used to shun.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the Trumpet will be blown. That is the Day of the Promised Threat.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And every soul will come, accompanied by a driver, and a witness:

Name: Qâf
Verse: ‘Verily, you were oblivious of this: So [now] We have removed from you your covering, and so your sight on this day is acute’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And his companion will say, ‘This is what I have ready with me [as testimony]’:

Name: Qâf
Verse: ‘Cast into Hell every obdurate disbeliever,

Name: Qâf
Verse: hinderer of good, transgressor, skeptic,

Name: Qâf
Verse: who has set up alongside God another god! Cast him then into the severe chastisement’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And his companion will say, ‘Our Lord! I did not make him a rebel, but he [himself] was in extreme error’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: He will say, ‘Do not dispute in My presence, for I had already given you the threat.

Name: Qâf
Verse: The word [that comes] from Me cannot be altered, and I am not unjust to servants’

Name: Qâf
Verse: on the day when We will say to Hell, ‘Are you [now] full?’ and it will say: ‘Are there any more?’

Name: Qâf
Verse: And Paradise will be brought near for the God-fearing, not far [anymore].

Name: Qâf
Verse: ‘This is what you were promised — [it is] for every penitent one, who is mindful,

Name: Qâf
Verse: who fears the Compassionate One [while He is] in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: ‘Enter it in peace! That is the day of immortality’.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Therein they will have whatever they wish; and with Us there is yet more.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And how many a generation We destroyed before them, who were mightier than these in prowess, and [who] then searched throughout the land [wondering]: is there any escape?

Name: Qâf
Verse: Assuredly there is in that a reminder for him who has a heart, or gives ear in [full] witness.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And verily We created the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in six days, and no weariness touched Us.

Name: Qâf
Verse: So endure [patiently] what they say, and glorify with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before the sunset;

Name: Qâf
Verse: and glorify Him at [some part of the] night and after prostrations.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And listen on the day when the caller calls out from a place that is near.

Name: Qâf
Verse: On the day when they hear the Call of truth; that is the day of coming forth.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Indeed it is We Who give life and bring death, and to Us is the journey’s end.

Name: Qâf
Verse: On the day when the earth is split asunder from them, [they will come] hastening forth. That is an easy gathering for Us.

Name: Qâf
Verse: We know best what they say, and you are not [to be] a coercer of them. So admonish by the Qur’ān those who fear My threat.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: By the scatterers that scatter

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and those that bear a burden

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and those that run with ease

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and those that apportion by command,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: assuredly what you are promised is true,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and assuredly judgement will take place!

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And by the heaven with all its tracks,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: indeed you are of differing opinions.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: He is turned away therefrom who has deviated.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Perish the conjecturers,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: who are in a stupor, heedless.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They ask: ‘When is the Day of Judgement?’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: On the day when they will be tormented in the Fire:

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: ‘Taste this torment of yours. This is what you sought to hasten on!’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Truly the God-fearing will be amid gardens and springs,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: receiving what their Lord has given them, for indeed formerly they had been virtuous.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Little of the night did they use to sleep,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and at dawns they used to seek forgiveness,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and there was a share in their wealth [assigned] for the beggar and the deprived.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in the earth there are signs for those who know with certainty,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and in your souls. Will you not then perceive?

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And in the heaven is your provision, and [there is also] what you are promised.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So by the Lord of the heaven and the earth, it is as assuredly true as [the fact] that you have [power of] speech.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Has the story reached you of Abraham’s honoured guests?

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: When they entered upon him and said, ‘Peace!’ He said, ‘Peace!’ [These are] an unfamiliar folk.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then he went aside to his family and brought a fat calf;

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and he placed it near them saying, ‘Will you not eat?’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then he conceived a fear of them. They said, ‘Do not be afraid!’ And they gave him good tidings of [the birth of] a knowledgeable boy.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then his wife came forward clamouring and smote her face, and said, ‘A barren old woman!’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They said, ‘So has your Lord said. Indeed He is the Wise, the Knower’.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: He said, ‘So what is your business, O you who have been sent [by God]?’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: They said, ‘Lo! we have been sent to a guilty folk

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: that we may unleash upon them stones of clay,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: marked by your Lord for [the destruction of] the prodigal’.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So We brought forth those in them who were believers,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: but We did not find therein other than one house of those who had submitted [to God].

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful chastisement.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And [a sign too] in Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear warrant,

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: but he turned away to his supports, saying, ‘A sorcerer, or a madman!’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So We seized him and his hosts and cast them into the waters, for he was blameworthy.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And [also] in ‘ād [was another sign], when We unleashed against them a barren wind.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: It did not leave anything that it came upon without making it like decayed bones.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And [also] in Thamūd, when it was said to them, ‘Enjoy [yourselves] for a while!’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Then they defied the command of their Lord; so the thunderbolt seized them as they were looking around.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So they were unable to rise up, nor were they victors.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And the people of Noah aforetime. Indeed they were an immoral lot.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And the heaven, We built it with might, and indeed We are powerful.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And the earth, We spread it out: what excellent Spreaders then!

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And of all things We created pairs that perhaps you might remember.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So flee unto God. Truly I am a clear warner to you from Him.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And do not set up another god alongside God. Truly I am a clear warner to you from Him.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Thus there did not come to those who were before them any messenger but they said: ‘A sorcerer, or a madman!’

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Have they enjoined this upon one another? Nay, but they are an insolent folk.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: So shun them, for you will not be reproached.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And remind for reminding truly benefits believers.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except that they may worship Me.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: I do not desire from them any provision, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: Indeed it is God Who is the Provider, the Lord of Strength, the Firm.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: And for those who have wronged, there will assuredly be a lot like the lot of their counterparts. So let them not ask Me to hasten on.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: For woe to those who disbelieve, from that day of theirs which they are promised.

Name: The Mount
Verse: By the Mount,

Name: The Mount
Verse: and an inscribed Book,

Name: The Mount
Verse: on an unrolled parchment.

Name: The Mount
Verse: By the [greatly] frequented House,

Name: The Mount
Verse: and the raised roof,

Name: The Mount
Verse: and the swarming sea:

Name: The Mount
Verse: lo! your Lord’s chastisement will assuredly take place;

Name: The Mount
Verse: there is none that can avert it.

Name: The Mount
Verse: On the day when the heaven will heave with a great heaving,

Name: The Mount
Verse: and the mountains move with a great motion.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Woe then on that day to the deniers,

Name: The Mount
Verse: those who play around in vain talk;

Name: The Mount
Verse: the day when they will be thrust with a violent thrust into Hell:

Name: The Mount
Verse: ‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!

Name: The Mount
Verse: Is this then sorcery or is it that you do not see?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Burn in it! And whether you endure or do not endure will be the same for you. You are only being requited for what you used to do’.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Truly the God-fearing will be amid gardens and bliss,

Name: The Mount
Verse: rejoicing in what their Lord has given them, and [that] their Lord has shielded them from the chastisement of Hell-fire.

Name: The Mount
Verse: ‘Eat and drink in full enjoyment [as a reward] for what you used to do’.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And those who believed and whom We made to be followed by their descendants in faith, We will make their descendants join them, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every man is subject to what he has earned.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And We will supply them with fruits and meat, such as they desire.

Name: The Mount
Verse: They will pass from one to another therein, a cup wherein is neither vain talk nor cause for sin.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And there will circulate from all around them youths of their own, as if they were hidden pearls.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And some among them will turn to one another, questioning each other.

Name: The Mount
Verse: They say: ‘Truly, before, amid our families, we used to be ever anxious;

Name: The Mount
Verse: but God showed us favour and shielded us from the piercing chastisement,

Name: The Mount
Verse: indeed before we used to call on Him. Verily He is the Benign, the Merciful.

Name: The Mount
Verse: So remind. For by the grace of your Lord you are neither soothsayer nor madman.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they say: ‘A poet, for whom we may await the accidents of fate?’

Name: The Mount
Verse: Say: ‘Await! For I too will be with you awaiting’.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do their faculties of understanding prompt them to [say] this? Or are they a rebellious lot?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they say, ‘He has improvised it?’ Rather they do not believe.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Then let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Nay, but they are not certain.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord? Or are they the ones in control?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they have a ladder, whereby they eavesdrop? Then let their eavesdropper produce a manifest warrant.

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or does He have daughters, whereas you have sons?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or are you asking them for a fee so that they are weighed down with debt?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they have [access to] the Unseen so that they can write it down?

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they desire to outmanoeuvre? But those who disbelieve, they are the outmanoeuvred ones!

Name: The Mount
Verse: Or do they have a god other than God? Glory be to God [exalted is He] above any partners that they may ascribe!

Name: The Mount
Verse: And if they were to see a fragment of the heaven falling, they would say: ‘A heap of clouds!’

Name: The Mount
Verse: So leave them until they encounter that day of theirs in which they will be thunderstruck,

Name: The Mount
Verse: the day when their guile will avail them nothing and they will not be helped.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And assuredly for those who do wrong, there is a chastisement beyond that, but most of them do not know.

Name: The Mount
Verse: And submit patiently to the judgement of your Lord, for surely you fare before Our eyes. And glorify with praise of your Lord when you rise,

Name: The Mount
Verse: and glorify Him at night and at the receding of the stars.

Name: The Star
Verse: By the Star when it sets,

Name: The Star
Verse: your companion has neither gone astray, nor has he erred;

Name: The Star
Verse: nor does he speak out of [his own] desire.

Name: The Star
Verse: It is but a revelation that is revealed,

Name: The Star
Verse: taught to him by one of awesome power,

Name: The Star
Verse: possessed of vigour; and he stood upright,

Name: The Star
Verse: when he was on the highest horizon.

Name: The Star
Verse: Then he drew near and drew closer still,

Name: The Star
Verse: until he was within the length of two bows away or [even] nearer,

Name: The Star
Verse: whereat He revealed to His servant what he revealed.

Name: The Star
Verse: The heart did not deny what he saw.

Name: The Star
Verse: Will you then dispute with him concerning what he saw?

Name: The Star
Verse: And verily he saw him another time,

Name: The Star
Verse: by the Lote-tree of the Ultimate Boundary,

Name: The Star
Verse: near which is the Garden of the Retreat,

Name: The Star
Verse: when there shrouded the Lote-tree that which shrouded [it],

Name: The Star
Verse: The eye did not swerve, nor did it go beyond [the bounds].

Name: The Star
Verse: Verily he saw some of the greatest signs of his Lord.

Name: The Star
Verse: Have you considered al-Lāt and al-’Uzzā,

Name: The Star
Verse: and Manāt, the third, the other?

Name: The Star
Verse: Are you to have males, and He females?

Name: The Star
Verse: That, then, would indeed be an unfair division!

Name: The Star
Verse: These are nothing but names which you have named, you and your fathers. God has not revealed any warrant for them. They follow nothing but conjecture and that which [ignoble] souls desire, even though guidance has already come to them from their Lord.

Name: The Star
Verse: Or shall man have whatever he wishes for?

Name: The Star
Verse: Yet to God belong the Hereafter and the former [life].

Name: The Star
Verse: And how many an angel there is in the heavens whose intercession cannot avail in any way except after God gives permission for whomever He wills, and He is satisfied.

Name: The Star
Verse: Truly those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels the names of females.

Name: The Star
Verse: But they do not have any knowledge thereof. They follow nothing but conjecture, and indeed conjecture can never substitute for the truth.

Name: The Star
Verse: So shun him who turns away from Our Remembrance, and desires nothing but the life of this world.

Name: The Star
Verse: That is the full extent of their knowledge. Truly your Lord knows best those who have strayed from His way, and He knows best those who are [rightly] guided.

Name: The Star
Verse: And to God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth that He may requite those who do evil for what they have done, and reward those who are virtuous with the best [reward].

Name: The Star
Verse: Those who avoid grave sins and abominations, excepting lesser offences. Truly your Lord is of vast forgiveness. He knows you best [from the time] when He produced you from the earth, and when you were hidden [fetuses] in the bellies of your mothers. So do not claim purity for yourselves. He knows best those who are God-fearing.

Name: The Star
Verse: Did you see him who turned away,

Name: The Star
Verse: and gave a little, and was then grudging?

Name: The Star
Verse: Does he possess knowledge of the Unseen so that he sees?

Name: The Star
Verse: Or has he not been informed of what is in the scrolls of Moses,

Name: The Star
Verse: and Abraham who fulfilled [his summons]

Name: The Star
Verse: that no burdened soul shall bear the burden of another,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that man shall have only what he [himself] strives for,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that his endeavour will be seen,

Name: The Star
Verse: then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that the ultimate end is toward your Lord,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that it is He Who makes to laugh and makes to weep,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that it is He Who brings death and gives life,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that He [Himself] creates the two spouses, the male and the female,

Name: The Star
Verse: from a drop [of semen] once it is emitted,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that with Him rests the second genesis,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that it is He Who enriches and grants possessions,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that it is He Who is the Lord of Sirius,

Name: The Star
Verse: and that He destroyed former ‘ād

Name: The Star
Verse: and Thamūd sparing not;

Name: The Star
Verse: and the people of Noah before that; indeed they were more unjust and more insolent;

Name: The Star
Verse: and the Deviant [cities] He overturned

Name: The Star
Verse: so that there covered them that which covered [them].

Name: The Star
Verse: Then which of the bounties of your Lord do you dispute?

Name: The Star
Verse: This is a warner [in the tradition] of the warners of old.

Name: The Star
Verse: The Impending [Hour] is imminent.

Name: The Star
Verse: None besides God can disclose it.

Name: The Star
Verse: Do you then marvel at this discourse,

Name: The Star
Verse: and laugh and not weep,

Name: The Star
Verse: while you remain oblivious?

Name: The Star
Verse: So prostrate to God and worship Him

Name: The Moon
Verse: The Hour has drawn near and the moon has split.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And if they see a sign, they turn away and say: ‘A powerful sorcery!’

Name: The Moon
Verse: And they denied and followed their own desires, and every matter will be settled.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily there has come to them such tidings as contain a deterrent,

Name: The Moon
Verse: wisdom [that is] far-reaching; but warnings are of no avail.

Name: The Moon
Verse: So turn away from them! On the day when the Summoner summons to an awful thing;

Name: The Moon
Verse: with their downcast looks they will emerge from the graves as though they were scattered locusts,

Name: The Moon
Verse: scrambling toward the Summoner. The disbelievers will say: ‘This is a hard day!’

Name: The Moon
Verse: The people of Noah denied before them. Thus they denied Our servant and said, ‘A madman!’, and he was reviled.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And so he invoked his Lord, [saying,] ‘I have been overcome, so help [me]!’

Name: The Moon
Verse: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with torrential waters,

Name: The Moon
Verse: and We made the earth burst forth with springs and the waters met for a purpose that was preordained.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And We bore him on one, [made] of planks and nails,

Name: The Moon
Verse: sailing before Our eyes, as retaliation for [the sake of] him who was rejected.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We left it as a sign. So is there anyone who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: How [dreadful] then were My chastisement and My warnings?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We have made the Qur’ān easy to remember. So is there anyone who remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: ‘ād denied. How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed We unleashed upon them a clamorous wind on a day of prolonged ill fortune,

Name: The Moon
Verse: tearing people away, as if they were trunks of uprooted palm-trees.

Name: The Moon
Verse: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We have made the Qur’ān easy to remember. So is there anyone who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Thamūd denied the warnings,

Name: The Moon
Verse: and they said, ‘Is it a mortal alone among us that we are to follow? Then indeed we would be in error and insanity!

Name: The Moon
Verse: Has the Reminder been cast upon him [alone] from among us? Nay, but he is a conceited liar.

Name: The Moon
Verse: ‘They will know tomorrow who is the conceited liar.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Lo! We are sending the She-camel as a trial for them. So watch them and remain patient.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And inform them that the water is to be divided between them, every drinking will be attended’.

Name: The Moon
Verse: But they called their companion so he took and he hamstrung [her].

Name: The Moon
Verse: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed We unleashed upon them a single Cry, and they became like the chaff of a corral builder.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We have made the Qur’ān easy to remember. So is there anyone who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: The people of Lot denied the warnings.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed We unleashed upon them a squall of pebbles, [all] except the family of Lot whom We delivered at dawn

Name: The Moon
Verse: as a grace from Us. So do We requite him who gives thanks.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily he had warned them of Our strike, but they disputed the warnings.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And they had even solicited of him his guests. So We blotted out their eyes. ‘So taste [now] My chastisement and My warnings’.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily there greeted them in the early morning an abiding chastisement.

Name: The Moon
Verse: ‘So taste [now] My chastisement and My warnings!’

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We have made the Qur’ān easy to remember. So is there anyone who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily there came to Pharaoh’s folk the warnings.

Name: The Moon
Verse: They denied Our signs, all of them. So We seized them with the seizing of One [Who is] Mighty, Omnipotent.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Are your disbelievers better than those? Or have you [been granted] some immunity in the Scriptures?

Name: The Moon
Verse: Or do they say: ‘We are a host that will be helped to victory’?

Name: The Moon
Verse: The host will [truly] be routed and turn its back [to flee].

Name: The Moon
Verse: Nay, but the Hour is their tryst, and the Hour will be more calamitous and more bitter.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Indeed the guilty are in error and in a blazing fire.

Name: The Moon
Verse: The day when they are dragged into the Fire on their faces: ‘Taste [now] the touch of Saqar’.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Truly everything have We created in a measure.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And Our command is but a single word, like the twinkling of an eye.

Name: The Moon
Verse: And verily We have destroyed the likes of you. So is there anyone who will remember?

Name: The Moon
Verse: And everything they have done is in the scrolls,

Name: The Moon
Verse: and every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

Name: The Moon
Verse: Assuredly the God-fearing will be amid gardens and rivers

Name: The Moon
Verse: in an abode of truth, before a King [Who is] Omnipotent.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The Compassionate One

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: has taught the Qur’ān.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: He created man,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: teaching him the [coherent] speech.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The sun and the moon follow a reckoning,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: and the grass and the trees prostrate.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And He has raised the heaven and set up the balance,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And observe the weights with justice and do not skimp the balance.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And the earth, He placed it for [all] creatures.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In it are fruits and date-palms with sheaths,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: and grain with husk, and fragrant herb.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: He created man of dry clay resembling the potter’s,

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: and He created the jānn of a smokeless flame of fire.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Lord of the two Easts, and Lord of the two Wests.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: He has loosed the two waters; [and so] they meet.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Between them there is a barrier. They do not overstep.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: From [both of] them is brought forth the pearl and the coral.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: His are the crafted ships [that sail] in the sea [appearing] like landmarks.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Everyone who is on it will perish;

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: yet there will remain the countenance of your Lord, [the countenance] of majesty and munificence.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth implore Him. Every day He is upon some matter.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: We will attend to you, O you two heavy ones!

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: O company of jinn and humans, if you are able to pass through the confines of the heavens and the earth, then pass through! You will not pass through except with a sanction.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Against you will be unleashed a heat of fire and a flash of brass, and you will not be able to seek help.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And when the heaven is split open, and it turns crimson like tanned leather.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Thus on that day no man will be questioned about his sin, nor any jinn.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: The guilty will be recognised by their mark; so they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: ‘This is Hell which the guilty [were wont to] deny!’

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: They shall pass round between it and boiling hot water.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: But for those who feared the station of their Lord, there will be two gardens.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Both with [abundant] branches.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them there are two flowing springs.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them, of every fruit there are two kinds.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In them are maidens of restrained glances, [maidens] who have not been touched by any man or jinn before them.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: It is as though they are rubies and pearls.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Is the reward of goodness anything but goodness?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: And beside these there will be two [other] gardens.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Deep green.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them will be two gushing fountains.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In both of them will be fruits and date-palms and pomegranates.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: In them are maidens [who are] good, beautiful

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Houris secluded in pavilions.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Untouched by any man before them or jinn.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Reclining upon green cushions and lovely druggets.

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Blessed be the Name of your Lord, He of Majesty and Munificence.

Name: The Event
Verse: When the [imminent] Event comes to pass,

Name: The Event
Verse: there will be no denying its coming to pass,

Name: The Event
Verse: When the earth is shaken with a violent shock,

Name: The Event
Verse: and the mountains are pulverised to [tiny] pieces,

Name: The Event
Verse: so that they become a scattered dust,

Name: The Event
Verse: and you will be three kinds:

Name: The Event
Verse: Those of the right [hand] — what of those of the right [hand]?

Name: The Event
Verse: And those of the left [hand] — what of those of the left [hand]?

Name: The Event
Verse: And the foremost, the foremost:

Name: The Event
Verse: they are the ones brought near [to God],

Name: The Event
Verse: in the Gardens of Bliss,

Name: The Event
Verse: a multitude from the former [generations],

Name: The Event
Verse: and a few from the later ones

Name: The Event
Verse: reclining on them, face to face.

Name: The Event
Verse: They will be waited on by immortal youths

Name: The Event
Verse: with goblets and ewers and a cup from a flowing spring,

Name: The Event
Verse: wherefrom they suffer no headache nor any stupefaction,

Name: The Event
Verse: and such fruits as they prefer,

Name: The Event
Verse: and such flesh of fowls as they desire,

Name: The Event
Verse: and houris with wide eyes

Name: The Event
Verse: resembling hidden pearls,

Name: The Event
Verse: a reward for what they used to do.

Name: The Event
Verse: They will not hear therein any vain talk or any sinful words,

Name: The Event
Verse: but only the saying, ‘Peace!’ ‘Peace!’

Name: The Event
Verse: And those of the right [hand] — what of those of the right [hand]?

Name: The Event
Verse: Amid thornless lote-trees

Name: The Event
Verse: and clustered plantains,

Name: The Event
Verse: and extended shade,

Name: The Event
Verse: and cascading water,

Name: The Event
Verse: and abundant fruit,

Name: The Event
Verse: neither unavailable, nor forbidden,

Name: The Event
Verse: and mattresses [that are] raised.

Name: The Event
Verse: Verily We have created them with an [unmediated] creation,

Name: The Event
Verse: and made them virgins,

Name: The Event
Verse: amorous, of equal age,

Name: The Event
Verse: for those of the right [hand]:

Name: The Event
Verse: A multitude from the former [generations],

Name: The Event
Verse: and a multitude of the later ones.

Name: The Event
Verse: And those of the left [hand] — what of those of the left [hand]?

Name: The Event
Verse: Amid a scorching wind and scalding water,

Name: The Event
Verse: and the shade of pitch-black smoke,

Name: The Event
Verse: neither cool nor pleasant.

Name: The Event
Verse: Indeed before that they used to live at ease,

Name: The Event
Verse: and they used to persist in the great sin.

Name: The Event
Verse: And they used to say, ‘What! When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we indeed be resurrected?

Name: The Event
Verse: What! And our forefathers too?’

Name: The Event
Verse: Say: ‘Truly the former and the later [generations]

Name: The Event
Verse: will be gathered for the tryst of a known day.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then indeed you, the erring, the deniers,

Name: The Event
Verse: will assuredly eat from a Zaqqūm tree

Name: The Event
Verse: and fill therewith your bellies,

Name: The Event
Verse: and drink on top of that boiling water,

Name: The Event
Verse: drinking like the drinking of thirsty camels’.

Name: The Event
Verse: This will be the hospitality for them on the Day of Judgement.

Name: The Event
Verse: We created you. Will you not then affirm [this] truth?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the sperm that you emit?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creators?

Name: The Event
Verse: We have ordained death among you, and We are not to be outmanoeuvred from

Name: The Event
Verse: replacing [you with] your likes and making you in what you do not know.

Name: The Event
Verse: For verily you have known the first creation, why then will you not remember?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered what you sow?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who make it grow, or are We the Grower?

Name: The Event
Verse: If We will, We could surely turn it into chaff, and you would remain bemused:

Name: The Event
Verse: ‘We have indeed suffered loss!

Name: The Event
Verse: Nay, but we are deprived!’

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the water you drink?

Name: The Event
Verse: Is it you who cause it to come down from the [rain] clouds or are We the Causer of its coming down?

Name: The Event
Verse: If We willed, We could make it bitter — why then will you not give thanks?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the fire that you kindle?

Name: The Event
Verse: Was it you who created the tree thereof or were We the Creator?

Name: The Event
Verse: We made it a reminder and a boon for the desert-travellers.

Name: The Event
Verse: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous.

Name: The Event
Verse: Nay, I swear by the setting-places of the stars!

Name: The Event
Verse: And indeed it is a tremendous oath, if you only knew.

Name: The Event
Verse: This is indeed a noble Qur’ān,

Name: The Event
Verse: in a Book guarded

Name: The Event
Verse: which none touch except the purified,

Name: The Event
Verse: a revelation by the Lord of the Worlds.

Name: The Event
Verse: Do you then belittle this discourse?

Name: The Event
Verse: And for your livelihood you offer your denial?

Name: The Event
Verse: Why then, when it reaches the [dying person’s] throat

Name: The Event
Verse: and you are at that moment looking,

Name: The Event
Verse: and We are nearer to him than you are, but you do not perceive —

Name: The Event
Verse: why then, if you are not going to face a reckoning,

Name: The Event
Verse: do you not bring it back, if you are truthful?

Name: The Event
Verse: Thus if he be of those brought near,

Name: The Event
Verse: then repose, and a goodly provision, and a garden of Bliss.

Name: The Event
Verse: And if he be of those of the right [hand],

Name: The Event
Verse: then ‘Peace be to you’, [a greeting] from those of the right [hand].

Name: The Event
Verse: But if he be of the deniers, the erring,

Name: The Event
Verse: then a welcome of boiling water,

Name: The Event
Verse: and a roasting in Hell-fire.

Name: The Event
Verse: This indeed is the certain truth.

Name: The Event
Verse: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous.

Name: Iron
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth glorifies God; and He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: Iron
Verse: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life and He brings death, and He has power over all things.

Name: Iron
Verse: He is the First and the Last, and the Manifest and the Hidden and He has knowledge of all things.

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He Who created the heavens and the earth in six days, then presided upon the Throne. He knows what enters the earth, and what issues from it, and what comes down from the heaven. And He is with you wherever you may be; and God is Seer of what you do.

Name: Iron
Verse: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to Him [all] matters are returned.

Name: Iron
Verse: He makes the night pass into the day, and makes the day pass into the night. And He is Knower of what is in the breasts.

Name: Iron
Verse: Believe in God and His Messenger, and expend out of that over which He has made you successors. For those of you who believe and expend will have a great reward.

Name: Iron
Verse: And why should you not believe in God when the Messenger is calling you to believe in your Lord, and a pledge has been taken from you if you are believers?

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He Who sends down upon His servant clear signs that He may bring you forth from the darkness to the light. For truly God is Kind, Merciful to you.

Name: Iron
Verse: And why should you not expend in the way of God when to God belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth. Not equal [to the rest of you] are those of you who expended and fought before the victory. Such are greater in rank than those who expended and fought afterwards. Yet to each God has promised the best reward. And God is Aware of what you do.

Name: Iron
Verse: Who is it that will lend God a goodly loan so that He may multiply it for him, and [so that] there may be for him a generous reward.

Name: Iron
Verse: The day when you will see the believing men and believing women with their light shining forth before them and on their right: ‘Good tidings for you on this day: Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide. That is the great success’.

Name: Iron
Verse: The day when the hypocrites, men and women, will say to those who believe, ‘Look at us that we may glean something of your light!’ It will be said: ‘Step back and seek light!’ Then there will be set up between them a wall with a gate, the inner side of which contains mercy, and the outer side of which faces toward the chastisement.

Name: Iron
Verse: They will call out to them, ‘Did we not use to be with you?’ They will say, ‘Yes, indeed! But you caused your souls to fall into temptation, and you awaited, and you doubted, and [false] hopes deceived you until God’s ordinance came; and the Deceiver deceived you concerning God.

Name: Iron
Verse: So on this day no ransom will be taken from you nor from those who disbelieved. Your abode will be the Fire: it will be your guardian, and an evil destination!’

Name: Iron
Verse: Is it not time for those who believe that their hearts should be humbled to the remembrance of God and [to] what has been revealed of the truth, and that they should not be like those who were given the Scripture before? For the stretch of time was too long for them and so their hearts became hardened, and many of them are immoral.

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that God revives the earth after its death. We have certainly made clear for you the signs that perhaps you may understand.

Name: Iron
Verse: Indeed men who give voluntary alms and women who give voluntary alms and [those of them] who have lent God a goodly loan, it will be multiplied for them and they will have a generous reward.

Name: Iron
Verse: And those who believe in God and His messengers — they are the truthful, and the witnesses with their Lord; they will have their reward and their light. But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs, they will be the inhabitants of Hell-fire.

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that the life of this world is merely play and diversion and glitter, and mutual vainglory in respect of wealth and children; as the likeness of rain whose vegetation the disbelievers admire; [but] then it withers, and you see it turn yellow, then it becomes chaff. And in the Hereafter there is a severe chastisement and forgiveness from God and beatitude; and the life of this world is but the comfort of delusion.

Name: Iron
Verse: Vie with one another for forgiveness from your Lord and a garden the breadth of which is as the breadth of the heaven and the earth, prepared for those who believe in God and His messengers. That is the bounty of God, which He gives to whomever He will, and God is [dispenser] of tremendous bounty.

Name: Iron
Verse: No affliction befalls in the earth, or in yourselves, but it is in a Book before We bring it about — that is indeed easy for God,

Name: Iron
Verse: so that you may not grieve for what escapes you, nor exult at what He has given you. For God does not like any swaggering braggart;

Name: Iron
Verse: such as are niggardly and bid people to be niggardly. And whoever turns away, still God, He is indeed the Independent, the Praiser.

Name: Iron
Verse: We have verily sent Our messengers with clear signs, and We revealed with them the Scripture and the Balance, so that mankind may uphold justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great might, and [many] uses for mankind, and so that God may know those who help Him and His messengers through the Unseen. Assuredly God is Strong, Mighty.

Name: Iron
Verse: And verily We sent Noah and Abraham and We ordained among their seed prophethood and the Scripture; and some of them are [rightly] guided, and many of them are immoral.

Name: Iron
Verse: Then We sent to follow in their footsteps Our messengers, and We sent to follow, Jesus son of Mary, and We gave him the Gospel, and We placed in the hearts of those who followed him kindness and mercy. But [as for] monasticism, they invented it — We had not prescribed it for them — only seeking God’s beatitude. Yet they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave those of them who believed their reward; but many of them are immoral.

Name: Iron
Verse: O you who believe, fear God and believe in His Messenger, and He will give you a twofold portion of His mercy; and He will assign for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; for God is Forgiving, Merciful;

Name: Iron
Verse: So that the People of the Scripture may know that they have no power over anything of God’s bounty, and that [all] bounty is in God’s hand; He gives it to whomever He will; and God is [dispenser] of tremendous bounty.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has certainly heard the words of her who disputes with you concerning her husband and complains to God. And God hears your conversation. Assuredly God is Hearer, Seer.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Those of you who repudiate their wives by zihār, they are not their mothers; their mothers are only those who gave birth to them, and indeed they utter indecent words and a calumny. Yet assuredly God is Pardoning, Forgiving.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: And those who repudiate their wives by zihār and then go back on what they have said, then [the penalty for them is] the setting free of a slave before they touch one another. By this you are being admonished; and God is Aware of what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: And he who cannot find [the wherewithal], then [his redemption shall be] the fasting of two successive months before they touch one another. And if he is unable, then [the redemption shall be] the feeding of sixty needy persons. This, so that you may believe in God and His Messenger. And these are God’s bounds; and for the rejecters there is a painful chastisement.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Indeed those who oppose God and His Messenger will be abased, just as those before them were abased. And verily We have revealed clear signs, and for those who disbelieve there is a humiliating chastisement.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: The day when God will raise them all together, He will then inform them of what they did. God has kept count of it, while they forgot it. And God is Witness to all things.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not seen that God knows all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth? Not secret conversation of three takes place but He is their fourth [companion], nor of five but He is their sixth, nor of fewer than that or more but He is with them wherever they may be. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Assuredly God has knowledge of all things.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not seen those who were forbidden from conversing in secret [but] then returned to that they had been forbidden, and [all the while] hold secret conversations [tainted] with sin and [plans for] enmity and disobedience to the Messenger? And [who] when they come to you, they greet you with that with which God never greeted you and they say within themselves, ‘Why does God not chastise us for what we say?’ Hell will suffice them! In it they will be made to burn — and [what] an evil journey’s end!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who believe, if you do talk in secret, then do not talk in secret sinfully and in enmity and disobedience to the Messenger, but talk secretly in piety and fear of God. And fear God to Whom you will be gathered.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Secret conversations are of [the work of] Satan that those who believe may end up grieving; but he cannot harm them in any way, except God’s leave. And in God let the believers put [all] their trust.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who believe, when it is said to you, ‘Make room’ during the assembly, then make room; God will make room for you. And when it is said, ‘Rise up’, God will raise those of you who have faith and those who have been given knowledge by degrees. And God is Aware of what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O you who believe, when you converse in secret with the Messenger, offer some voluntary alms before your secret talk. That is better for you and purer. But if you find nothing, then God is indeed Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Do you fear to offer [voluntary] alms before your secret talks. So, as you did not do this, and God relented to you, maintain prayer and pay the alms and obey God and His Messenger. For God is Aware of what you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Have you not regarded those who fraternise with a folk at whom God is wrathful? They neither belong with you, nor with them, and they swear falsely, while they know.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has prepared for them a severe chastisement. Evil indeed is that which they [are wont to] do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: They have taken their oaths as a shield, and so they bar from the way of God. So for them there will be a humiliating chastisement.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Neither their possessions nor their children will avail them in any way against God. Those — they are the inhabitants of the Fire, wherein they will abide.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: The day when God will raise them all together, whereupon they will swear to Him, just as they swear to you [now], and suppose that they are [standing] on something. Yet assuredly it is they who are the liars!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Satan has prevailed upon them, and so he has caused them to forget the remembrance of God. Those are Satan’s confederates. Yet it is indeed Satan’s confederates who are the losers!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Indeed those who oppose God and His Messenger — they will be among the most abased.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has inscribed: ‘I shall assuredly prevail, I and My messengers’. Truly God is Strong, Mighty.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: You will not find a people who believe in God and the Last Day loving those who oppose God and His Messenger, even though they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their clan. [For] those He has inscribed faith upon their hearts and reinforced them with a spirit from Him, and He will admit them into gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide, God being pleased with them, and they being pleased with Him. Those [they] are God’s confederates. Assuredly it is God’s confederates who are the successful.

Name: Exile
Verse: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifies God. And He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: Exile
Verse: It is He Who expelled those who disbelieved of the People of the Scripture from their homelands at the first exile. You did not think that they would go forth, and they thought that they would be protected by their fortresses from God. But God came at them from whence they had not reckoned, and He cast terror into their hearts, destroying [as they did] their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers. So take heed, O you who have eyes!

Name: Exile
Verse: And had God not prescribed banishment for them, He would have chastised them in this world, and in the Hereafter there is for them the chastisement of the Fire.

Name: Exile
Verse: That is because they defied God and His Messenger; and whoever defies God, indeed God is severe in retribution.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatever palm-trees you cut down or left standing on their roots, it was by God’s leave, and in order that He might disgrace those who are immoral.

Name: Exile
Verse: And whatever spoils God has given to His Messenger from these, you did not spur for it any horses or camels, but God gives His messengers sway over whomever He will, and God has power over all things.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatever spoils God has given to His Messenger from the people of the towns, belong to God and to the Messenger and to the near of kin, and the orphans, and the needy, and the traveller, so that these do not become a thing circulating between the rich among you. And whatever the Messenger gives you, take it; and whatever he forbids you, abstain [from it]. And fear God. Surely God is severe in retribution.

Name: Exile
Verse: And those who had settled in the hometown, and [had abided] in faith before them, love those who have emigrated to them, and do not find in their breasts any need of that which those [others] have been given, but prefer [others] to themselves, though they be in poverty. And whoever is saved from the avarice of his own soul, those — they are the successful.

Name: Exile
Verse: And those who will come after them say, ‘Our Lord, forgive us and our brethren who preceded us in [embracing] the faith, and do not place any rancour in our hearts toward those who believe. Our Lord, You are indeed Kind, Merciful!’

Name: Exile
Verse: Have you not considered the hypocrites who say to their brethren who disbelieve from among the People of the Scripture: ‘If you are expelled, we will assuredly go forth with you, and we will never obey anyone against you. And if you are fought against, we will certainly help you’. And God bears witness that they are truly liars.

Name: Exile
Verse: You indeed arouse greater awe in their hearts than God. That is because they are a people who do not comprehend.

Name: Exile
Verse: They will not fight against you together, except in fortified towns or from behind some wall. Their might is great among themselves. You [would] suppose them to be all together, but their hearts are disunited. That is because they are a people who have no sense;

Name: Exile
Verse: as the likeness of those who, recently before them tasted the evil consequences of their conduct. And for them there will be a painful chastisement.

Name: Exile
Verse: Like Satan when he says to man, ‘Disbelieve!’; so that when he [man] disbelieves, he says, ‘Lo! I am absolved of you. Indeed I fear God, the Lord of the Worlds’.

Name: Exile
Verse: So the sequel for both will be that they are in the Fire, therein abiding. And that is the requital of the evildoers.

Name: Exile
Verse: O you who believe, fear God and let every soul consider what it has sent ahead for tomorrow. And fear God. God is indeed Aware of what you do.

Name: Exile
Verse: And do not be like those who forget God, so that He makes them forget their own souls. Those — they are the immoral.

Name: Exile
Verse: Not equal are the inhabitants of the Fire and the inhabitants of Paradise. It is the inhabitants of Paradise who are the winners.

Name: Exile
Verse: Had We sent down this Qur’ān upon a mountain, you would have surely seen it humbled, rent asunder by the fear of God. And such similitudes do We strike for mankind, that perhaps they may reflect.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God, than Whom there is no other god, Knower of the unseen and the visible. He is the Compassionate, the Merciful.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God, than Whom there is no other god, the King, the Holy, the Peace, the Securer, the Guardian, the Mighty, the Compeller, the Exalted. Glorified be God above what partners they ascribe!

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God, the Creator, the Maker, the Shaper. To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names. All that is in the heavens and the earth glorify Him, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who believe, do not take My enemy and your enemy for friends. You offer them affection when verily they have disbelieved in the truth that has come to you, expelling the Messenger and you because you believe in God, your Lord. If you have gone forth to struggle in My way and to seek My pleasure…. You secretly harbour affection for them, when I know well what you hide and what you proclaim. And whoever among you does that has verily strayed from the right way.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: If they were to prevail over you, they would be your enemies, and would stretch out against you their hands and their tongues with evil [intent]; and they long for you to disbelieve.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Your relatives and your children will not avail you. On the Day of Resurrection you will be separated. And God is Seer of what you do.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Verily there is for you a good example in [the person of] Abraham, and those who were with him, when they said to their people, ‘We are indeed innocent of you and of what you worship besides God. We repudiate you, and between us and you there has arisen enmity and hate forever until you [come to] believe in God alone’, except for Abraham’s saying to his father, ‘I shall ask forgiveness for you, but I cannot avail you anything against God’. ‘Our Lord, in You we put our trust, and to You we turn [penitently], and to You is the journeying.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Our Lord, do not make us a cause of beguilement for those who disbelieve, and forgive us. Our Lord, You are indeed the Mighty, the Wise’.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Verily there is for you in them a good example, for those [of you] who anticipate God and the Last Day. And whoever turns away, [should know that] God is the Independent, the Worthy of Praise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: It may be that God will bring about between you and those of them with whom you are at enmity, affection. For God is Powerful, and God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: God does not forbid you in regard to those who did not wage war against you on account of religion and did not expel you from your homes, that you should treat them kindly and deal with them justly. Assuredly God loves the just.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: God only forbids you in regard to those who waged war against you on account of religion and expelled you from your homes and supported [others] in your expulsion, that you should make friends with them. And whoever makes friends with them, those — they are the wrongdoers.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who believe, when believing women come to you, emigrating, test them. God knows best [the state of] their faith. Then, if you know them to be believers, do not send them back to the disbelievers. They [the women] are not lawful for them, nor are they [the disbelievers] lawful for them. And give them what they have expended. And you would not be at fault if you marry them, when you have given them their dowries. And do not hold on to the [conjugal] ties of disbelieving women, and ask for [the return of] what you have expended. And let them ask for what they have expended. That is God’s judgement. He judges between you, and God is Knower, Wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: And if you lose any of your wives to the disbelievers, and so you retaliate, then give those whose wives have gone, the like of what they have expended. And fear God in Whom you believe.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O Prophet, if believing women come to you, pledging allegiance to you that they will not ascribe anything as partner to God, and that they will not steal, nor commit adultery, nor slay their children, nor bring any lie that they have invented [originating] between their hands and their legs, nor disobey you in what is decent, then accept their allegiance and ask God to forgive them; surely God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O you who believe, do not befriend a people against whom God is wrathful. They have truly despaired of the Hereafter, just as the disbelievers have despaired of those who are in the tombs.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifies God, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: It is greatly loathsome to God that you say what you do not do.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: Indeed God loves those who fight for His cause in ranks, as if they were a solid structure.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And when Moses said to his people, ‘O my people, why do you harm me, when certainly you know that I am the messenger of God to you?’ So when they deviated, God caused their hearts to deviate: and God does not guide the immoral folk.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And when Jesus son of Mary said, ‘O Children of Israel I am indeed God’s messenger to you, confirming what is before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger who will come after me, whose name is Ahmad’. Yet when he brought them, they said, ‘This is manifest sorcery!’

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And who does greater wrong than he who invents lies against God, when he is [actually] being summoned to submission [to God]? And God does not guide the wrongdoing folk.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: They desire to extinguish the light of God with their mouths, but God will perfect His light, though the disbelievers be averse.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with the guidance and the religion of truth, that He may make it prevail over all [other] religions, though the disbelievers be averse.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who believe, shall I show you a commerce that will deliver you from a painful chastisement?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: You should believe in God and His Messenger and struggle for the cause of God with your possessions and your lives. That is better for you, should you know.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: He will [then] forgive you your sins and admit you into gardens underneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in the Gardens of Eden. That is the supreme triumph.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And, another which you love: help from God and a victory near at hand. And give good tidings to the believers.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who believe, be helpers of God, just as said Jesus son of Mary to the disciples, ‘Who will be my helpers unto God?’ The disciples said, ‘We will be God’s helpers!’ So a group of the Children of Israel believed, while a group disbelieved. Then We strengthened those who believed against their enemy, and so they became the triumphant.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: All that is the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifies God, the King, the Holy, the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: It is He Who sent to the unlettered [folk] a messenger from among them to recite to them His signs, and to purify them, and to teach them the Book and wisdom, though indeed before that they had been in manifest error.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: And [to] others from among them, who have not yet joined them; and He is the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: That is the bounty of God, which He gives to whom He will and God is [dispenser] of tremendous bounty.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: The likeness of those who were entrusted with the Torah then failed to uphold it is as the likeness of an ass carrying books. Evil is the likeness of the people who deny God’s signs. And God does not guide the evildoing folk.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say: ‘O you of Jewry, if you claim that you are the [favoured] friends of God, to the exclusion of other people, then long for death, if you are truthful’.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But they will never long for it, because of what their hands have sent ahead; and God is Knower of the evildoers.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say: ‘Assuredly the death from which you flee will indeed encounter you; then you will be returned to the Knower of the Unseen and the visible, and He will inform you of what you used to do’.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: O you who believe, when the call for prayer is made on Friday, hasten to the remembrance of God, and leave aside [all] commerce. That is better for you, should you know.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: And when the prayer is finished, disperse in the land and seek God’s bounty, and remember God frequently, that perhaps you may be successful.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But when they sight some [opportunity for] business or a diversion, they scatter off towards it, and leave you standing. Say: ‘That which is with God is better than diversion and commerce. And God is the best of providers’.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: When the hypocrites come to you they say: ‘We bear witness that you are indeed the Messenger of God’. And God knows that you are indeed His Messenger, and God bears witness that the hypocrites truly are liars.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They have taken their oaths as a shield, and so they have barred from the way of God. Evil indeed is that which they are wont to do.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: That is because they believed, then disbelieved; therefore their hearts have been stamped. Hence they do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And when you see them, their figures please you; and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [Yet] they are like blocks of timber [that have been] propped-up. They assume that every cry is [directed] against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May God assail them! How can they deviate?

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And when it is said to them, ‘Come, and God’s Messenger will ask forgiveness for you’, they twist their heads, and you see them turning away, disdainful.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: will be the same for them, whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them: God will never forgive them. Indeed God does not guide the immoral folk.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They are the ones who say: ‘Do not expend on those who are with the Messenger of God, until they scatter off’. Yet to God belong the treasuries of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They say, ‘Surely if we return to Medina, the powerful will [soon] expel from it the weaker’. Yet [the real] might belongs to God and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: O you who believe, do not let your possessions and your children divert you from the remembrance of God; for whoever does that — it is they who are the losers.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And expend of that with which We have provided you before death comes to any of you, whereat he will say, ‘My Lord, if only You would reprieve me for a short time so that I might give charity and become one of the righteous!’

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: But God will never reprieve a soul when its term has come. And God is Aware of what you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifies God. To Him belongs the Kingdom and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He has power over all things.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: It is He Who created you. Then some of you are disbelievers and some of you are believers; and God is Seer of what you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth, and He shaped you and made your shapes excellent; and to Him is the journey’s end.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He knows all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you hide and what you disclose, and God is Knower of what is in the breasts.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Has there not come to you the tidings of those who disbelieved before and thus tasted the evil consequences of their conduct? And there will be for them a painful chastisement?

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: That is because their messengers used to bring them clear signs, but they said, ‘Shall [mere] humans be our guides?’ So they disbelieved and turned away, and God was independent. And God is Independent, Praised.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Those who disbelieve claim that they will never be resurrected. Say: ‘Yes indeed, by my Lord! You will be resurrected; then you will be informed of what you did. And that is easy for God’.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: So believe in God and His Messenger and the Light, which We have revealed. And God is Aware of what you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
