Verse: The day when He will gather you for the Day of Gathering that will be the Day of Dispossession. And [as for] those who believe in God and act righteously, He will absolve them of their misdeeds and admit them into gardens underneath which rivers flow wherein they will abide. That is the supreme triumph.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: And [as for] those who disbelieved and denied Our signs — those, they will be the inhabitants of the Fire, wherein they will abide. And [what] an evil journey’s end!

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: No affliction strikes except by the leave of God. And whoever believes in God, He will guide his heart. And God is Knower of all things.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: And obey God and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away, then the Messenger’s duty is only to communicate [the Message] clearly.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: God — there is no god except Him. And in God let [all] believers put their trust.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: O you who believe! Indeed among your wives and children there are enemies for you, so beware of them. And if you pardon, and overlook [such enmity] and forgive, then assuredly God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Your possessions and your children are only a trial, and God — with Him is a great reward.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: So fear God as far as you can, and listen, and obey and expend; that is better for your souls. And whoever is shielded from the avarice of his own soul, such are the successful.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: If you lend God a good loan, He will multiply it for you and He will forgive you, and God is Appreciative, Forbearing,

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Knower of the Unseen, and the visible, the Mighty, the Wise.

Name: Divorce
Verse: O Prophet, when you [men] divorce women, divorce them by their prescribed period. And count the prescribed period, and fear God your Lord. Do not expel them from their houses, nor let them go forth, unless they commit a blatant [act of] indecency. And those are God’s bounds; and whoever transgresses the bounds of God has verily wronged his soul. You never know: it may be that God will bring something new to pass afterwards.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Then, when they have reached their term, retain them honourably, or separate from them honourably. And call to witness two just men from among yourselves, and bear witness for the sake of God. By this is exhorted whoever believes in God and the Last Day. And whoever fears God, He will make a way out for him;

Name: Divorce
Verse: and He will provide for him from whence he never expected. And whoever puts his trust in God, He will suffice him. Indeed God fulfils His command. Verily God has ordained for everything a measure.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And [as for] those of your women who no longer expect to menstruate, if you have any doubts, their prescribed [waiting] period shall be three months, and [also for] those who have not yet menstruated. And those who are pregnant, their term shall be when they deliver. And whoever fears God, He will make matters ease for him.

Name: Divorce
Verse: That is God’s command which He has revealed to you. And whoever fears God, He will absolve him of his misdeeds and magnify the reward for him.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Lodge them where you dwell in accordance with your means and do not harass them so as to put them in straits. And if they are pregnant, then maintain them until they deliver. Then, if they suckle for you, give them their wages, and consult together, honourably. But if you both make difficulties, then another woman will suckle [the child] for him.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Let the affluent man expend out of his affluence. And let he whose provision has been straitened for him, expend of what God has given him. God does not charge any soul save except with what He has given it. God will assuredly bring about ease after hardship.

Name: Divorce
Verse: And how many a town disobeyed the command of its Lord and His messengers, then We called it to a severe reckoning and chastised it with a dire chastisement.

Name: Divorce
Verse: So it tasted the evil consequences of its conduct, and the consequence of its conduct was [utter] loss.

Name: Divorce
Verse: God has prepared for them a severe chastisement. So fear God, O people of pith, [you] who believe! God has certainly revealed to you a [source of] remembrance,

Name: Divorce
Verse: a messenger, reciting to you the clear signs of God that He may bring forth those who believe and perform righteous deeds from darkness to light. And those who believe in God and act righteously, He will admit them into gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. God has verily made a good provision for him.

Name: Divorce
Verse: God it is Who created seven heavens, and of earth the like thereof. The command descends between them that you may know that God has power over all things and that God encompasses all things in knowledge.

Name: Banning
Verse: O Prophet! Why do you prohibit what God has made lawful for you, seeking to please your wives? And God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: Banning
Verse: Verily God has prescribed for you [when necessary] the absolution of your oaths. And God is your Protector, and He is the Knower, the Wise.

Name: Banning
Verse: And when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a certain matter; but when she divulged it and God apprised him of it, he announced part of it, and passed over part. So when he told her about it, she said, ‘Who told you this?’ He said, ‘I was told by the Knower, the Aware’.

Name: Banning
Verse: If the two of you repent to God … for your hearts were certainly inclined, and if you support one another against him, then [know that] God, He is indeed his Protector, and Gabriel, and the righteous among the believers, and the angels furthermore, are his supporters.

Name: Banning
Verse: It may be that, if he divorces you, his Lord will give him in [your] stead wives better than you — women submissive [to God], believing, obedient, penitent, devout, given to fasting, previously married and virgins.

Name: Banning
Verse: O you who believe! Guard yourselves and your families against a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which stand angels, stern, mighty, who do not disobey God in what He commands them, but do what they are commanded.

Name: Banning
Verse: ‘O you who disbelieve! Do not make any excuses today. You are only being requited for what you used to do’.

Name: Banning
Verse: O you who believe! Repent to God with sincere repentance. It may be that your Lord will absolve you of your misdeeds and admit you into gardens, underneath which rivers flow, on the day when God will not let down the Prophet and those who believe with him. Their light will be running before them and on their right. They will say: ‘Our Lord! Perfect our light for us and forgive us. Assuredly You have power over all things’.

Name: Banning
Verse: O Prophet! Struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be stern with them. For their abode will be Hell — and [what] an evil journey’s end!

Name: Banning
Verse: God has struck a similitude for those who disbelieve: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants, yet they betrayed them. So they did not avail the two women in any way against God, and it was said: ‘Enter, both of you, the Fire along with the incomers’.

Name: Banning
Verse: And God has struck a similitude for those who believe: the wife of Pharaoh when she said, ‘My Lord, build for me a home near You in Paradise, and deliver me from Pharaoh and his work, and deliver me from the evildoing folk’.

Name: Banning
Verse: And Mary daughter of ‘Imrān, who preserved [the chastity of] her womb, so We breathed into it of Our Spirit, and she confirmed the words of her Lord and His Scriptures, and she was of the obedient.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Blessed is He in Whose hand is [all] sovereignty, and He has power over all things.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the Compassionate One’s creation any irregularity. Then cast your eyes again: Do you see any fissure?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Then cast your eyes yet again and your sight will return to you humbled and wearied.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And verily We have adorned the lowest heaven with lamps, and made them missiles against the devils; and We have prepared for them the chastisement of the Blaze.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there is the chastisement of Hell, and [what] an evil journey’s end!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: When they are flung into it they hear it blaring as it seethes,

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: almost exploding with rage. Whenever a host is flung into it, its keepers ask them: ‘Did there not come to you a warner?’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: They will say, ‘Yes, a warner did indeed come to us, but we denied and said, “God has not revealed anything; you are assuredly in great error” ’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And they will say, ‘Had we listened or comprehended, we would not have been among the inhabitants of the Blaze’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Thus they will confess their sin. So away with the inhabitants of the Blaze!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Assuredly those who fear their Lord in secret, there will be for them forgiveness and a great reward.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And [whether you] keep secret your speech or proclaim it, He indeed is Knower of what is in the breasts.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Will He Who has created not know? And He is the Subtle, the Aware.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: It is He Who made the earth tractable for you, so walk in its flanks and eat of His provision; and to Him is the resurrection.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Are you secure [in thinking] that He Who is in the heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you while it quakes?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Are you secure [in thinking] that He Who is in the heaven will not unleash upon you a squall of pebbles? But you will [soon] come to know the nature of My warning.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And verily those who were before them denied, then [see] how was My rebuttal!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or have they not seen the birds above them spreading their wings and closing? Nothing sustains them, except the Compassionate One. Indeed He is Seer of all things.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is it that will be an army for you to help you besides the Compassionate One? The disbelievers are in nothing but delusion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? Nay, but they persist in disdain and aversion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Is he who walks cast down on his face more rightly guided, or he who walks upright on a straight path?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘It is He Who created you and endowed you with hearing and sight and hearts. Little do you thank!’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘It is He Who multiplied you on earth, and to Him you will be gathered’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And they say: ‘When will this promise be [fulfilled], if you are truthful?’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘The knowledge is only with God, and I am but a plain warner’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: But when they see it near at hand, the faces of those who disbelieved will be awry, and it will be said: ‘This is that which you used to make claims about’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘Have you considered: If God destroys me and those with me, or has mercy on us, who then will protect the disbelievers from a painful chastisement?’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘He is the Compassionate One; we believe in Him, and in Him we put our trust. And assuredly you will [soon] know who is in manifest error’.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ‘Have you considered: If your water were to sink deep into the earth, who then will bring you running water?’

Name: The Pen
Verse: Nūn. By the Pen and what they inscribe.

Name: The Pen
Verse: You are not by the grace of your Lord, a madman.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And assuredly you will have an unfailing reward.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And assuredly you possess a magnificent nature.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then you will see and they will see,

Name: The Pen
Verse: which of you is demented.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Assuredly your Lord knows best those who stray from His way, and He knows best those who are guided.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So do not obey the deniers.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They desire that you should be pliable, so that they may be pliable [towards you].

Name: The Pen
Verse: And do not obey any mean oath-monger,

Name: The Pen
Verse: backbiting, scandal-monger,

Name: The Pen
Verse: hinderer of good, sinful transgressor,

Name: The Pen
Verse: coarse-grained, moreover ignoble,

Name: The Pen
Verse: When Our signs are recited to him, he says: ‘Fables of the ancients!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: We shall brand him on the snout.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Indeed We have tried them, just as We tried the owners of the garden, when they vowed that they would pluck in the morning.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they did not make any exception.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then a visitation from your Lord visited it while they slept.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So by the morning it was like the darkness of night.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They then called out to one another in the morning,

Name: The Pen
Verse: So off they went, whispering to one another:

Name: The Pen
Verse: ‘No needy person shall today come to you in it’.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they went forth early, able to prohibit.

Name: The Pen
Verse: But when they saw it, they said, ‘Assuredly we have strayed!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: ‘Nay, but we have been deprived!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: The most moderate among them said, ‘Did I not say to you, “Why do you not glorify?” ’

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, ‘Glory be to God, our Lord. Verily we have been wrongdoers’.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They then turned to one another, blaming each other.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, ‘O woe to us! We have indeed been unjust.

Name: The Pen
Verse: It may be that our Lord will give us in its place one that is better than it. Truly we turn humbly to our Lord’.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Such will be the chastisement; and the chastisement of the Hereafter is assuredly greater, did they but know.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Verily for the God-fearing there will be the Gardens of Bliss near their Lord.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Are We then to treat those who submit [to Us] as [We treat] the sinners?

Name: The Pen
Verse: What is wrong with you? How do you judge?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do you have a Scripture, wherein you learn,

Name: The Pen
Verse: that you will indeed have in it whatever you choose?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do you have oaths, binding on Us until the Day of Resurrection that you will indeed have whatever you decide?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Ask them, which of them will aver that?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do they have partners? Then let them produce their partners if they are truthful.

Name: The Pen
Verse: The day when the shank is bared and they are summoned to prostrate themselves, but they will not be able [to do so].

Name: The Pen
Verse: With humbled gazes they will be overcast by abasement; for they had indeed been summoned to prostrate themselves while they were yet sound.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So leave Me [to deal] with those who deny this discourse. We will draw them on by degrees, whence they do not know.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And I will grant them respite; [for] assuredly My devising is firm.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or are you asking them a fee, so that they are weighed down with debt?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do they possess [access to] the Unseen, so that they are writing down?

Name: The Pen
Verse: So await patiently the judgement of your Lord, and do not be like the one of the whale, who called out, choking with grief.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Had it not been for a grace from his Lord that reached him, he would have surely been cast onto a wilderness, while he was blameworthy.

Name: The Pen
Verse: But his Lord chose him and made him one of the righteous.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Indeed those who disbelieve would almost throw you down [to the ground] with their looks when they hear the Reminder, and they say: ‘He is truly a madman!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: Yet it is just a Reminder for all the worlds.

Name: The Reality
Verse: The Reality.

Name: The Reality
Verse: What is the Reality?

Name: The Reality
Verse: And how would you know what the Reality is?

Name: The Reality
Verse: Thamūd and ‘ād denied the Clatterer.

Name: The Reality
Verse: As for Thamūd, they were destroyed by the [overwhelming] Roar.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And as for ‘ād, they were destroyed by a deafening violent wind.

Name: The Reality
Verse: He forced it upon them for seven nights and eight days, successively, so that you might have seen the people therein lying prostrate, as if they were the hollow trunks of palm-trees.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So do you see any remnant of them?

Name: The Reality
Verse: And Pharaoh and those of his followers and the Deviant [cities] brought iniquity.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a devastating blow.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Truly when the waters rose high, We carried you in the sailing vessel,

Name: The Reality
Verse: so that We might make it a reminder for you and that receptive ears might remember it.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Thus when the Trumpet is blown with a single blast,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and the earth and the mountains are lifted and levelled with a single levelling,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then, on that day, the [imminent] Event will come to pass,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and the heaven will be rent asunder — for it will be very frail on that day —

Name: The Reality
Verse: and the angels will be [all] over its borders, and above them — on that day eight will carry the Throne of your Lord.

Name: The Reality
Verse: On that day you will be exposed. No hidden thing of yours will remain hidden.

Name: The Reality
Verse: As for him who is given his book in his right hand, he will say: ‘Here, read my book!

Name: The Reality
Verse: I was truly certain that I would encounter my account’.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So he will enjoy a pleasant living,

Name: The Reality
Verse: in a lofty Garden,

Name: The Reality
Verse: whose clusters are in easy reach.

Name: The Reality
Verse: ‘Eat and drink in enjoyment for what you did in advance in former days’.

Name: The Reality
Verse: But as for him who is given his book in his left hand, he will say, ‘O would that I had not been given my book,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and not known what my account were!

Name: The Reality
Verse: O would that it had been the [final] end.

Name: The Reality
Verse: My wealth has not availed me.

Name: The Reality
Verse: My authority has gone from me’.

Name: The Reality
Verse: ‘Seize him, then fetter him,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then admit him into Hell-fire, .

Name: The Reality
Verse: then in a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Lo! he never believed in God the Tremendous,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and never urged the feeding of the needy;

Name: The Reality
Verse: therefore here today he has no [loyal] friend,

Name: The Reality
Verse: nor any food except pus,

Name: The Reality
Verse: which none shall eat but the sinners’.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So indeed I swear by all that you see,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and all that you do not see

Name: The Reality
Verse: it is indeed the speech of a noble messenger.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And it is not the speech of a poet. Little do you believe!

Name: The Reality
Verse: Nor [is it] the speech of a soothsayer. Little do you remember!

Name: The Reality
Verse: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And had he fabricated any lies against Us,

Name: The Reality
Verse: We would have assuredly seized him by the Right Hand,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then We would have assuredly severed his life-artery,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and not one of you could have defended him.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And assuredly it is a reminder for the God-fearing.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And assuredly We know that some of you are deniers.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And assuredly it is a [cause of] anguish for the disbelievers.

Name: The Reality
Verse: And assuredly it is the certain truth.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Tremendous.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: A petitioner petitioned an impending chastisement

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: — which in the case of the disbelievers none can avert —

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: from God, Lord of the Ascensions.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: To Him ascend the angels and the Spirit in a day whose span is fifty thousand years.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So be patient with a graceful patience.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Lo! they see it as [being] far off,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: while We see it [to be] near.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: The day when the heaven will be as molten silver,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and the mountains will be as flakes of wool.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: And no friend will inquire about his friend.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: They will [however] be made to see them. The guilty one will desire to ransom himself from the chastisement of that day at the price of his children,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and his companion, and his brother,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and his kin that had sheltered him,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and all who are on earth, if it might then deliver him.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Nay! Lo! [for him] it will be the Churning Fire

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: ripping out the scalp;

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: it will call him who turned his back and ignored,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and amassed [wealth], then hoarded [it].

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Indeed man was created restless:

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: when evil befalls him, [he is] anxious,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and when good befalls him, [he is] grudging,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: except those who perform prayers,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: those who maintain their prayers,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and in whose wealth there is an acknowledged due,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: for the beggar and the deprived,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and who affirm the truth of the Day of Judgement,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and who are apprehensive of the chastisement of their Lord —

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: lo! there is no security from the chastisement of their Lord —

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and those who guard their private parts,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: except from their wives and those whom their right hands own, for in that case they are not blameworthy;

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: but whoever seeks beyond that, those are the infringers,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and those who are keepers, of their trusts and their covenant,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and who stand firm in their testimony,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and who preserve their prayers.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Those will be in Gardens, honoured.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So what is wrong with those who disbelieve that they keep staring towards you

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: to the right and to the left in droves?

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Does each one of them hope to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Nay! Indeed We created them from what they know.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: For verily I swear by the Lord of the rising-places and the setting-places, that We are able

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: to replace [them] with [others] better than them, and We are not to be outmanoeuvred.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So leave them to indulge and to play, until they encounter that day of theirs, which they are promised;

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: the day when they will come forth from the graves hastening, as if racing to a [standing] target

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: with their eyes humbled, overcast by abasement. Such is the day which they are promised.

Name: Noah
Verse: Verily We sent Noah to his people [saying]: ‘Warn your people before there come on them a painful chastisement’.

Name: Noah
Verse: He said, ‘O my people, I am indeed a plain warner to you,

Name: Noah
Verse: that He may forgive you some of your sins and defer you, until an appointed term. Indeed when God’s term comes, it cannot be deferred, if only you knew’.

Name: Noah
Verse: He said, ‘My Lord, I have summoned my people night and day,

Name: Noah
Verse: but my summon has only increased their evasion.

Name: Noah
Verse: And indeed whenever I summoned them, so that You might forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, and draw their cloaks over themselves, and they persist, and act in great arrogance.

Name: Noah
Verse: Then indeed I summoned them aloud;

Name: Noah
Verse: then assuredly I proclaimed to them, and I confided to them secretly,

Name: Noah
Verse: saying, “Ask your Lord for forgiveness. Assuredly He is ever Forgiving.

Name: Noah
Verse: He will release the heaven for you in torrents,

Name: Noah
Verse: and furnish you with wealth and sons, and assign to you gardens, and assign to you rivers.

Name: Noah
Verse: What is wrong with you that you do not hope for dignity from God,

Name: Noah
Verse: when verily He created you in stages?

Name: Noah
Verse: Have you not seen how God created seven heavens in layers,

Name: Noah
Verse: and made the moon therein as a light and made the sun as a lamp?

Name: Noah
Verse: And God has caused you to grow from the earth.

Name: Noah
Verse: Then He will make you return into it and bring you forth [with a veritable bringing forth].

Name: Noah
Verse: And God has made the earth a flat [open] expanse for you,

Name: Noah
Verse: so that you may follow throughout it spacious routes” ’.

Name: Noah
Verse: Noah said, ‘My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children, only add to their loss.

Name: Noah
Verse: And they have devised a mighty plot,

Name: Noah
Verse: and have said: “Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadd nor Suwā’, nor Yaghūth and Ya’ūq and Nasr”,

Name: Noah
Verse: And they have certainly led astray many. And do not [O God] increase the evildoers except in error!’

Name: Noah
Verse: Because of their iniquities they were drowned then made to enter the Fire. And they did not find for themselves besides God any helpers.

Name: Noah
Verse: And Noah said, ‘My Lord, do not leave from among the disbelievers a single dweller upon the earth.

Name: Noah
Verse: Assuredly if You leave them, they will lead Your servants astray, and will beget only disbelieving profligates.

Name: Noah
Verse: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house as a believer, and believing men and believing women, and do not increase the evildoers except in ruin’.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ‘It has been revealed to me that a company of the jinn listened, then said: “We have indeed heard a marvellous Qur’ān,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: which guides to rectitude. Therefore we believe in it and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [we believe] that exalted be the majesty of our Lord; He has taken neither spouse nor son.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that the fool among us used to utter atrocious lies against God.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we thought that humans and jinn would never utter a lie against God,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that certain individuals of mankind used to seek the protection of certain individuals of the jinn so that they increased them in oppressiveness.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And they thought just as you thought, that God would never raise anyone.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we made for the heaven, but we found it filled with mighty guards and meteors.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we used to sit in [certain] places therein to listen in; but anyone listening now will find a meteor lying in wait for him.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we do not know whether ill is intended for those who are in the earth, or whether their Lord intends for them good.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that among us some have become righteous and some of us are otherwise; we are [made up of] different sects.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And we assume that we will never be able to elude God in the earth, nor will we be able to elude Him by fleeing.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. For whoever believes in his Lord shall fear neither loss nor oppression.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that among us some have submitted [to God], while some of us are unjust. So whoever has submitted [to God], those are the ones who seek right guidance.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And as for those are unjust, they will be firewood for Hell!” ’.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [it has been revealed to me] that if they adopt the [right] path, We will give them abundant water to drink,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: so that We may try them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, We will admit him into a tortuous chastisement.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And [it has been revealed to me] that the places of prayer belong to God, so do not invoke anyone along with God.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And that when the servant of God rose to invoke Him, they were almost upon him in heaps.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: He said, ‘I invoke only my Lord, and I do not associate anyone with Him’.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ‘I truly have no power to bring you any harm or any guidance’.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ‘Indeed none shall protect me from God, and I shall never find besides Him any refuge.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: I have power to bring you] only a communication from God and His Messages. And whoever disobeys God and His Messenger, indeed there will be for him the fire of Hell, abiding therein forever’.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Such that when they see what they are promised, they will then know who is weaker in supporters and fewer in numbers.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ‘I do not know if what you are promised is near, or if my Lord has set a [distant] length for it.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Knower [He is] of the Unseen and He does not disclose His Unseen to anyone,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: except to a messenger of whom He approves. Then, He despatches before him and behind him watchers,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: so that He may know that they have conveyed the Messages of their Lord, and He encompasses all that is with them and keeps count of all things’.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: O you enwrapped in your garment!

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Stand vigil through the night, except a little,

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: a half of it, or reduce of it a little,

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: or add to it, and recite the Qur’ān in a measured tone.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Verily [soon] We shall cast on you a weighty word.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Assuredly rising in the night is firmer in tread and more upright in respect to speech.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And mention the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself [exclusively] to Him with complete devotion.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Lord of the east and the west; there is no god except Him, so take Him for a Guardian,

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: and bear patiently what they say, and part with them in a gracious manner.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: And leave Me [to deal] with the deniers, those enjoying affluence, and respite them a little.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: and a food that chokes, and a painful chastisement,

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: on the day when the earth and the mountains will quake and the mountains will be like heaps of shifting sand.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: We have indeed sent to you a Messenger to be a witness against you, just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a severe seizing.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: So, if you disbelieve, how will you guard against a day that will make the children grey-haired,

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: with the heaven being rent asunder thereon. His promise shall be fulfilled.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Indeed these are a reminder. Let him who will, then, choose a way to his Lord.

Name: The Enshrouded One
Verse: Assuredly your Lord knows that you stand vigil less than two thirds of the night, or [at times] a half of it or a third of it along with a group of those with you; and God measures the night and the day. He knows that you will not be able to keep count of it, and so He has relented to you. So recite as much as is feasible of the Qur’ān. He knows that some of you will be sick, while others will be travelling in the land, seeking the bounty of God, and others will be fighting in the way of God. So recite as much as is feasible of it and perform prayer and pay alms and lend God a goodly loan. For whatever good you send ahead for [the sake of] your souls, you will find that, with God, it will be better and greater in terms of reward. And seek forgiveness from God; assuredly God is Forgiving, Merciful.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: O you enveloped in your mantle,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: arise and warn,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and magnify your Lord,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and purify your clothes,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and shun [all] defilement.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And do not grant a favour seeking greater gain,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and endure patiently for the sake of your Lord.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: For when the trumpet is sounded,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: that day will be a harsh day

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: for the disbelievers, not at all easy.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Leave Me [to deal] with him whom I created lonely,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and [then] assigned him ample means,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and sons present [by his side],

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and facilitated for him greatly.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Still he is eager that I should give [him] more.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Nay! He is indeed stubborn to Our signs.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Indeed he pondered and decided.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Perish he, how he decided!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Again, perish he, how he decided!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he contemplated.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he frowned and scowled.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Then he turned his back in disdain,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and said, ‘This is nothing but handed-down sorcery;

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: this is nothing but the speech of humans’.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: I shall [soon] admit him into Saqar!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And how would you know what is Saqar?

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: It neither spares nor leaves behind.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: It burns away the flesh.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: There are nineteen [keepers] standing over it.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And We have appointed only angels as wardens of the Fire, and We have made their number only as a stumbling-block for those who disbelieve, so that those who were given the Scripture may be certain, and that those who believe may increase in faith, and that those given the Scripture and the believers may not be in doubt, and that those in whose hearts there is a sickness, and the disbelievers may say, ‘What did God mean by this similitude?’ Thus, God leads astray whom He will and guides whom He will. And none knows the hosts of your Lord, except Him. And it is nothing but a reminder for humans.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Nay, by the moon!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And by the night when it returns!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And by the dawn when it appears!

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Verily it is one of the enormities —

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: a warning to [all] humans;

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Every soul is held to ransom by what it earns,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: except those of the right [hand],

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: in gardens, questioning one another,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: about the guilty:

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: ‘What has landed you in Saqar?’

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: They will say, ‘We were not of those who prayed.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Nor did we [ever] feed the needy.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And we used to delve along with those who delved,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: and we used to deny the Day of Judgement,

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: until [finally] the inevitable came to us’.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Thus the intercession of the intercessors will not avail them.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: So what is wrong with them that they turn away from the Reminder

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: as if they were wild asses

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: fleeing from a lion?

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: Nay, but everyone of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No indeed! Rather they do not fear the Hereafter.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: No indeed! Assuredly it is a Reminder.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: So whoever wills shall remember it.

Name: The Cloaked One
Verse: And they will not remember unless God wills [it]. He is [the One] worthy of [your] fear, and [the One] worthy to forgive.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Nay! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And, nay, I swear by the (self-)reproaching soul.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Does man suppose that We shall not assemble his bones?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Yes, indeed! We are able to reshape [even] his fingers!

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Nay, but man desires to deny what lies ahead of him.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: He asks, ‘When is the Day of Resurrection?’

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: But when the eyes are dazzled

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and the moon is eclipsed,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and the sun and the moon are brought together —

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: on that day man will say, ‘Where is the escape?’

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No indeed! There is no refuge.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: On that day the recourse will be to your Lord.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: On that day man will be informed of what he has sent ahead and left behind.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Rather man has insight into his [own] soul,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: though he should offer his excuses.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Do not move your tongue with it to hasten it.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Assuredly it is for Us to bring it together and to recite it.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: So, when We recite it, follow its recitation.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Then, it is for Us to explain it.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No indeed! Rather you love the transitory [life]

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and forsake the Hereafter.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Some faces on that day will be radiant,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: looking upon their Lord.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: And other faces on that day will be scowling,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: certain that a spine-crushing calamity will fall on them.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: No indeed! When it reaches up to the collar bones,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and it is said: ‘Where is the enchanter?’

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and he suspects that it is the [time of] parting,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and the shank is intertwined with the [other] shank;

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: on that day to your Lord will be the driving [of the souls].

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: For he neither affirmed [the truth], nor prayed,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: but he denied and he turned away,

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: then went off to his family swaggering.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: then [may woe be] nearer to you and nearer!

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Does man suppose that he is to be left aimless?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Was he not a drop of emitted semen?

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Then it became a clot; then He created and proportioned [him],

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: and made of it the two sexes, the male and the female.

Name: The Rising of the Dead
Verse: Is not such able to revive the dead?

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Has there [ever] been for man a period of time in which he was a thing unmentioned?

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Verily We created man from a drop of mixed fluid, so that We may test him. So We made him hearing, seeing.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Verily We have guided him to the way, whether he be grateful or ungrateful.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: We have assuredly prepared for the disbelievers chains, and fetters, and a hell-fire.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Truly the righteous will drink from a cup whose mixture is camphor;

Name: Time or Man
Verse: a spring from which the servants of God drink, making it gush forth plenteously.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: They fulfil their vows and fear a day the evil of which will be widespread.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they give food, despite [their] love of it to the needy, and the orphan, and the prisoner.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: ‘We feed you only for the sake of God. We do not desire any reward from you, nor any thanks.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Indeed we fear from our Lord a day of frowning, calamitous’.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: God has therefore shielded them from the evil of that day, and has granted them radiancy and joy.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And He has rewarded them for their patience with a Garden and silk,

Name: Time or Man
Verse: reclining therein upon couches. They will not find therein either sun or bitter cold.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And close over them will be its shades and its clusters [of fruits] will hang low.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they will be waited upon from all around them with vessels of silver, and goblets of crystal —

Name: Time or Man
Verse: crystal of silver, which they have measured in a precise measure.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they will be given to drink therein a cup whose mixture is ginger,

Name: Time or Man
Verse: a spring therein named Salsabīl.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And they will be waited upon by immortal youths, whom, when you see them you will suppose them to be scattered pearls.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And when you look there, you will see bliss and a great kingdom.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Upon them will be garments of fine green silk and [heavy] silk brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver and their Lord will give them a pure drink to drink.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: ‘Verily this is a reward for you, and your endeavour has been appreciated’.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Assuredly We have revealed the Qur’ān to you as a gradual revelation.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: So submit patiently to your Lord’s decree, and do not obey of them any sinner or disbeliever.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: And mention the Name of your Lord at dawn and with the declining of the sun,

Name: Time or Man
Verse: and prostrate to Him for a portion of the night, and glorify Him the length of the night.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: Assuredly these love the transitory [life] and leave behind them a burdensome day.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: We created them and made firm their frames, and, whenever We will, We can completely replace them with others like them.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: This is indeed a reminder. Let him who will, then, choose a way to his Lord.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: But you will not, unless God wills. Assuredly God is ever Knower, Wise.

Name: Time or Man
Verse: He admits whomever He will into His mercy, and as for the evildoers, He has prepared for them a painful chastisement.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: By those sent in succession,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: by the raging hurricanes,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: by the sweeping spreaders,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: by the decisive discriminators,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: by the casters of the remembrance,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: to excuse or to warn,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Surely that which you are promised will befall.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: So when the stars are obliterated,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: and when the heaven is rent asunder,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: and when the mountains are blown away,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: and when the time is set for the [testimony of the] messengers,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For what day has it been appointed?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For the Day of Decision.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: And how would you know what the Day of Decision is?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Did We not destroy the ancients,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: then made the latter folk follow them?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: So will We deal with the guilty.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Did We not create you from a base fluid,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: then lodged it in a secure abode

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: for a known span?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Thus We were able; so [how] excellent able ones We are!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Have We not made the earth a receptacle

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: for the living and the dead,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: and set therein soaring mountains and give you sweet water to drink?

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Depart to that which you used to deny!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Depart to a triple-forked shadow

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: which is neither shady, nor of any avail against the flame.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed it throws up sparks, [huge] like palace edifices,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: as if they were [dark] yellow camels.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: This is the day in which they will not utter,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: nor will they be given permission, and so offer excuses.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: ‘This is the Day of Decision. We have brought you and the ancients together;

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: So if you have any stratagems, try your strategems against Me!’

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Truly the God-fearing will be amid shade and springs,

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: and fruits such as they desire:

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: ‘Eat and drink in [full] enjoyment for what you used to do’.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Indeed so do We reward the virtuous.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: ‘Eat and enjoy for a little. Indeed you are guilty!’

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: For when it is said to them, ‘Bow down!’, they do not bow down.

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day!

Name: The Emissaries
Verse: In what discourse, then, after this will they believe?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: About what are they questioning one another?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: About the awesome tiding,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: concerning which they are at variance.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: No indeed! they will come to know.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Again, no indeed! They will come to know!

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Have We not made the earth a cradle,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and the mountains pegs?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: And created you in pairs?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and made your sleep for rest?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and made the night a cloak?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and made the day for livelihood?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and built above you seven mighty ones?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and set a radiant lamp?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and sent down from the rain-clouds cascading water?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: that with it We may bring forth grains and plants,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and gardens of intertwining foliage?

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Verily the Day of Decision is the tryst,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: the day the Trumpet is blown and you come in droves,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and the heaven is opened and becomes as gates,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and the mountains are set in motion, and become as a mirage.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Verily Hell lurks in ambush

Name: The Tidings
Verse: for the rebellious [it is] a resort,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: to remain therein for ages,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: tasting in it neither coolness, nor drink,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: except boiling water and pus,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: as a fitting requital.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Indeed they never feared any reckoning,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and they denied Our signs mendaciously,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and everything have We kept count of in a Book.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: ‘So [now] taste! For We will increase you in nothing but chastisement’.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Truly for the God-fearing there will be a triumph:

Name: The Tidings
Verse: gardens and vineyards,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and buxom maidens of equal age,

Name: The Tidings
Verse: and a brimming cup.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: They will not hear in it any vain talk or lies —

Name: The Tidings
Verse: on the day when the Spirit and the angels stand arrayed. They will not speak, except him whom the Compassionate One permits, and who says what is right.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: That is the True Day. So whoever wishes [to], let him seek resort with his Lord.

Name: The Tidings
Verse: Lo! We have warned you of a chastisement that is near, the day when a person will behold what his hands have sent ahead and the disbeliever will say, ‘O would that I were dust!’

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: By those that wrest violently;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: by those that draw out gently;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: by those that glide serenely;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: by those that race forward;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and by those that direct the affair:

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: the day when the Tremor quakes,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and is followed by the Aftershock;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: on that day hearts will be trembling,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: their eyes humbled.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They will say: ‘Are we indeed being restored as before?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: What! When we have been decayed bones?’

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They will say, ‘That then would be a ruinous return!’

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But it will be only a single blast:

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: behold, then, they will be upon the surface of the earth.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Have you received the story of Moses,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: when his Lord called out to him in the holy valley of Tuwā?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: ‘Go to Pharaoh; he has indeed become rebellious,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and say, “Would you purify yourself

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and allow me to guide you to your Lord so that you may have fear [of Him]?” ’

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: So he showed him the greatest sign.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But he denied and disobeyed.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Then he turned his back, going about in haste.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Then he gathered, and proclaimed,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and said, ‘I am your most high lord!’

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: So God seized him as punishment for the latter and for the former.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Assuredly in that there is a moral for him who fears.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Are you harder to create or the heaven which He has built?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: He made it rise high and levelled it,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and darkened its night, and brought forth its day;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and after that He spread out the earth;

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: from it He has brought forth its waters and its pastures,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and has set firm the mountains

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: as a [source of] sustenance for you and your flocks.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: So when the Greatest Catastrophe befalls,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: the day when man will remember his efforts,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and the Hell-fire is revealed for all to see:

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: as for him who was rebellious,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: and preferred the life of this world,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Hell-fire will indeed be the abode.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: But as for him who feared the stance before his Lord, and forbade the soul from [pursuing] desire,

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: Paradise will indeed be the abode.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: They will ask you about the Hour: when will it set in?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: What have you to do with the mention of it?

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: With your Lord it belongs ultimately.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: You are only a warner for the one who fears it.

Name: Those Who Drag Forth
Verse: The day they see it, it will be as if they had only tarried for an evening or the morning thereof.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: He frowned and turned away,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: because the blind man came to him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And how would you know? Perhaps he would cleanse himself,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: or be admonished and so the reminder might benefit him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: But as for the one [who thinks himself] self-sufficient,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: to him you [do] attend;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: yet it is not your concern if he does not cleanse himself.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: But as for him who comes to you hurrying

Name: He Frowned
Verse: fearful,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: to him you pay no heed.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: No indeed! Truly it is a reminder,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: so let whoever will, remember it,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: on leaves [that are] honoured,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: elevated, purified,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: in the hands of scribes,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: noble, pious.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Perish man! What has made him ungrateful?

Name: He Frowned
Verse: From what thing has He created him?

Name: He Frowned
Verse: From a drop of sperm did He create him then proportion him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Then He made the way easy for him;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: then He makes him die and buries him;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: then, when He wills, He will raise him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: No indeed! He has not accomplished what He commanded him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: So let man consider his [source of] food

Name: He Frowned
Verse: that We pour down water plenteously;

Name: He Frowned
Verse: then We split the earth into fissures,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and cause the grains to grow therein,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and vines and herbs,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and olives and date-palms,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and gardens of dense foliage,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and fruits and pastures,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: as sustenance for you and your flocks.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: So when the [deafening] Cry comes —

Name: He Frowned
Verse: the day when a man will flee from his [own] brother,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and his mother and his father,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: and his wife and his sons,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: every person that day will have a matter to preoccupy him.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: On that day some faces will be shining,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: laughing, joyous.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: And some faces on that day will be covered with dust,

Name: He Frowned
Verse: overcast with gloom.

Name: He Frowned
Verse: Those are the disbelievers, the profligates.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: When the sun is folded away,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the stars scatter,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the mountains are set in motion,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the pregnant camels are neglected,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the wild beasts are mustered,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the seas are set afire,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the souls are coupled,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the girl buried-alive asks

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: for what sin she was slain,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the scrolls are unrolled,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the heaven is stripped off,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when the Hell-fire is set ablaze,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and when Paradise is brought near,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: So I swear by the receding [planets],

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: the movers, the setters,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and [by] the night as it approaches,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and [by] the dawn as it breathes,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: truly this is the word of a messenger [who is] noble,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: powerful, eminent in the presence of the Lord of the Throne;

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: obeyed there, trustworthy.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And your companion is not a madman.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: For verily he saw him on the clear horizon;

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: and he is not to be accused of [knowing] the Unseen.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: And it is not the word of an accursed satan.

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: So where are you going?

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: It is only a reminder for all worlds,

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: for those of you who wish to go straight;

Name: The Overthrowing
Verse: but you will not [wish], unless God, the Lord of the Worlds wills.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: When the heaven is split open,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: and when the stars are dispersed,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: and when the seas are burst forth,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: and when the tombs are overturned,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: a soul will know what it has sent ahead and left behind.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: O man! What has deceived you with regard to your generous Lord?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Who created you, then made you upright, then proportioned you,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: assembling you in whatever form He will?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: No indeed! Rather you deny Judgement.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Yet lo! there are above you watchers,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: noble, writers,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: who know whatever you do.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Indeed the pious shall be amid bliss,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: and indeed the profligates shall be in Hell-fire,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: entering it on the Day of Judgement,

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: and they shall not be absent from it.

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: And what would show you what the Day of Judgement is?

Name: The Cleaving
Verse: Again, what would show you what the Day of Judgement is?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Woe to the defrauders:

Name: Defrauding
Verse: those who, when they take measure from people, demand [it] in full;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: but [who] when they measure for them or weigh for them, they cause [them] loss.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Do such [individuals] not know for certain that they will be resurrected

Name: Defrauding
Verse: for an awful day,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: a day when mankind will rise before the Lord of the Worlds?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Nay! The record of the profligates is in Sijjīn.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: And what would tell you what Sijjīn is?

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Woe to the deniers on that day,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: who deny the Day of Judgement;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and none deny it but every sinful transgressor.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘[Mere] fables of the ancients!’

Name: Defrauding
Verse: No indeed! Rather there has slayed their hearts that which they earned.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Nay! They, on that day will be screened off from their Lord.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Then they will be exposed to Hell-fire,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: then it will be said: ‘This is that which you used to deny!’

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Nay! The record of the pious is in ‘Illiyyūn;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and what will tell you, what ‘Illiyyūn is?,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: witnessed by those brought near.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Assuredly the pious will be amid bliss,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: upon couches, gazing.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: You will perceive in their faces the radiancy of bliss,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: as they are given to drink a nectar [that is] sealed,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: whose seal is musk — so for such [bliss] let the viers vie —

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and whose mixture is of Tasnīm:

Name: Defrauding
Verse: a spring from which those brought near will drink.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Verily the guilty used to laugh at the believers;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and when they passed them by, they would wink at one another;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and when they returned to their folks they would return blithely;

Name: Defrauding
Verse: and when they see them, they say, ‘Lo! these [men] are astray!’

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Yet they were not sent as watchers over them.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: So today the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,

Name: Defrauding
Verse: upon couches, gazing.

Name: Defrauding
Verse: Have the disbelievers been requited for what they used to do?

Name: The Sundering
Verse: When the heaven is rent asunder,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and heeds its Lord as it should,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and when the earth is stretched out,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and casts out all that is in it, and empties itself,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and heeds its Lord, as it should.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: O man! Verily you are labouring toward your Lord laboriously, and you will encounter it.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Then as for him who is given his book in his right hand,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: he will receive an easy reckoning,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and return to his family, joyful.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: But as for him who is given his book from behind his back,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: he will pray for annihilation,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and he will enter the Blaze.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Indeed among his folk he used to be joyful;

Name: The Sundering
Verse: indeed he thought that he would never return.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Nay! Indeed his Lord is ever Seer of him.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So I swear by the twilight,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and [by] the night and what it envelops,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and [by] the moon when it is at the full:

Name: The Sundering
Verse: you will surely journey from stage to stage.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So what is wrong with them that they do not have faith,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and that when the Qur’ān is recited to them they do not prostrate?

Name: The Sundering
Verse: Nay, but the disbelievers deny,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: and God knows best what they are amassing.

Name: The Sundering
Verse: So give them good tidings of a painful chastisement,

Name: The Sundering
Verse: except those who believe and perform righteous deeds: theirs will be an unfailing reward.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: By the heaven of the constellations,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: and [by] the promised day,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: and [by] the witness, and the witnessed:

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: perish the men of the ditch!

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: of the fire abounding in fuel,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: when they sat by it,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: and they themselves, to what they did to those who believed, were witnesses.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: And all that they were vindicative towards them of was that they believed in God, the Mighty, the Praised,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and God is Witness to all things.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed those who persecute believing men and believing women, then do not repent, there will be for them the chastisement of Hell, and there will [also] be for them the chastisement of burning.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Indeed those who believe and perform righteous deeds, for them there will be gardens underneath which rivers flow: that is the supreme triumph.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Assuredly your Lord’s assault is severe.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Assuredly it is He Who originates and restores,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: and He is the Forgiving, the Loving,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Lord of the Throne, the Glorious,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Doer of what He desires.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Have you received the story of the hosts,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Pharaoh and Thamūd?

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Nay, but the disbelievers are [engrossed] in denial;

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: and God is behind them, All-Encompassing.

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: Nay, but it is a glorious Qur’ān,

Name: The Mansions of the Stars
Verse: in a tablet, preserved.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: By the heaven and the night-visitor!

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: And what will tell you what the night-visitor is?

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: The piercing star!

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Over every soul there is a keeper.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: So let man consider from what he was created.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: He was created from a gushing fluid,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: issuing from between the loins and the breast-bones.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Assuredly He is able to bring him back

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: on the day when [all] secrets are inspected,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: whereat he will have neither strength, nor any helper.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: By the heaven of returns,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: and [by] the earth of fissures,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: assuredly it is a decisive word,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: and it is not a jest.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: Indeed they are devising a plot,

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: and I [too] am devising a plot.

Name: The Morning Star
Verse: So respite the disbelievers; grant them respite for a little.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,

Name: The Most High
Verse: Who created and proportioned,

Name: The Most High
Verse: and Who determined and guided,

Name: The Most High
Verse: and Who brought forth the pasture,

Name: The Most High
Verse: then made it blackened stubble.

Name: The Most High
Verse: We will have you recite so that you will not forget,

Name: The Most High
Verse: except what God may will; assuredly He knows what is overt and what is hidden.

Name: The Most High
Verse: And We will ease your way to the easy way.

Name: The Most High
Verse: So remind, in case the reminder should be of benefit.

Name: The Most High
Verse: He who fears will be reminded;

Name: The Most High
Verse: but the wretched one will shun it,

Name: The Most High
Verse: he who will be roasted in the greater Fire;

Name: The Most High
Verse: then he will neither die therein, nor live.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Successful indeed is he who purifies himself,

Name: The Most High
Verse: and mentions the Name of his Lord and prays.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Nay, but you prefer the life of this world,

Name: The Most High
Verse: whereas the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

Name: The Most High
Verse: Truly this is in the former scrolls,

Name: The Most High
Verse: the scrolls of Abraham and Moses.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Has there come to you the tiding of the Enveloper?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Some faces on that day will be humbled,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: toiling, weary,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: roasting in a scorching fire,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: made to drink from a boiling spring.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: They will have no food except cactus,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: neither nourishing, nor availing against hunger.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Other faces on that day will be delicate,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: pleased by their efforts;

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: in a lofty Garden,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: in which they will not hear any vanity;

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: therein is a running spring;

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: therein are lofty couches,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: and goblets set,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: and cushions arrayed,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: and carpets spread out.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Will they not consider the camels, how they are created?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And the heaven, how it was raised?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And the mountains, how they were set?

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: And the earth, how it was laid out flat?,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: So remind. For you are only an admonisher;

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: you are not a taskmaster over them.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: But he who turns away and disbelieves,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: God will chastise him with the greater chastisement.

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: Truly to Us will be their return,

Name: The Overwhelming
Verse: then truly with Us will lie their reckoning.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: By the dawn,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and [by] the ten nights,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and [by] the even and the odd,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and [by] the night in motion:

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Is there in that an oath for one of sense?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with ‘ād,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Iram of the towering ones —

Name: The Dawn
Verse: the like of which was not created in the land,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and Thamūd, who hollowed the rocks in the valley,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and Pharaoh, the one of the tent-pegs —

Name: The Dawn
Verse: those who were rebellious in the land,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and caused much corruption therein?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: So your Lord poured on them a scourge of chastisement.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Assuredly your Lord is ever on the watch.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And as for man, whenever his Lord tests him and honours him, and is gracious to him, he says, ‘My Lord has honoured me’.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: But when he tests him and restricts his provision for him, he says, ‘My Lord has humiliated me’.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: No indeed! Rather they do not honour the orphan,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and they do not urge the feeding of the needy;

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and they devour inheritance greedily;

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and they love wealth with abounding love.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: No indeed! When the earth is pulverised repeatedly,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and your Lord, and the angels arrive rank on rank,

Name: The Dawn
Verse: and Hell on that day is brought [near]; on that day man will remember, but how will remembering avail him [now]?

Name: The Dawn
Verse: He will say, ‘O would that I had sent ahead for my life!’

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Then on that day none shall mete out His chastisement;

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And none shall bind His bind.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: ‘O soul at peace!

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Return to your Lord, pleased, pleasing.

Name: The Dawn
Verse: Then enter among My servants!

Name: The Dawn
Verse: And enter My Paradise!’

Name: The City
Verse: I swear by this land,

Name: The City
Verse: and you have free disposal of this land.

Name: The City
Verse: And [by] the begetter and that which he begat.

Name: The City
Verse: We certainly created man in travail.

Name: The City
Verse: Does he suppose that no one will have power over him?

Name: The City
Verse: He says, ‘I have exhausted vast wealth!’

Name: The City
Verse: Does he suppose that no one has seen him?

Name: The City
Verse: Have We not given him two eyes,

Name: The City
Verse: and a tongue, and two lips,

Name: The City
Verse: and guided him to the two paths?

Name: The City
Verse: Yet why does he not assault the obstacle?

Name: The City
Verse: And what will show you what the obstacle is?,

Name: The City
Verse: the freeing of a slave,

Name: The City
Verse: or to give food on a day of hunger,

Name: The City
Verse: to an orphan near of kin

Name: The City
Verse: or a needy person in misery;

Name: The City
Verse: while being one of those who believe and enjoin one another to steadfastness and enjoin one another to compassion.

Name: The City
Verse: Those are the ones of the right [side].

Name: The City
Verse: But those who disbelieve in Our signs, they are the ones of the left [side].

Name: The City
Verse: Over them will be an enclosing Fire.

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the sun and her morning light,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and [by] the moon when it follows her,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and [by] the day when it reveals her,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and [by] the night when it enshrouds her.

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the heaven and the One Who built it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and [by] the earth and the One Who spread it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and [by] the soul and the One Who proportioned it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and inspired to discern its vices and piety.

Name: The Sun
Verse: Successful indeed will be the one who purifies it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and he will indeed have failed he who eclipses it.

Name: The Sun
Verse: Thamūd denied because of their rebellious nature,

Name: The Sun
Verse: when the most wretched of them was dispatched.

Name: The Sun
Verse: But then the messenger of God said to them, ‘[This is] the she-camel of God, so let her have her drink!’

Name: The Sun
Verse: But they denied him, then hamstrung her. So their Lord closed in on them because of their sin, and meted it equally [among them].

Name: The Sun
Verse: And He does not fear the consequence of it.

Name: The Night
Verse: By the night as it enshrouds,

Name: The Night
Verse: and [by] the day as it unveils,

Name: The Night
Verse: and [by] the One Who created the male and the female.

Name: The Night
Verse: Assuredly your efforts are dissimilar.

Name: The Night
Verse: As for him who gives and is fearful,

Name: The Night
Verse: and affirms the truth of the best [word],

Name: The Night
Verse: We shall surely ease his way to [the abode of] ease.

Name: The Night
Verse: But as for him who is niggardly, and deems himself self-sufficient,

Name: The Night
Verse: and denies the best [word],

Name: The Night
Verse: We shall surely ease his way to hardship;

Name: The Night
Verse: And his wealth shall not avail him when he perishes.

Name: The Night
Verse: Truly with Us lies [all] guidance.

Name: The Night
Verse: And truly to Us belong the Hereafter and the first [life].

Name: The Night
Verse: So I have warned you of a raging fire,

Name: The Night
Verse: which none shall enter but the wretched one

Name: The Night
Verse: he who denies and turns away.

Name: The Night
Verse: The God-fearing one shall be spared it,

Name: The Night
Verse: he who gives his wealth to purify himself,

Name: The Night
Verse: and no one has any favour [outstanding] with him that must be requited;

Name: The Night
Verse: but only seeking the pleasure of his Lord the Most High;

Name: The Night
Verse: and verily [soon] he shall [himself] be pleased.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: By the forenoon,

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and [by] the night when it is still.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Your Lord has neither forsaken you, nor does He hate you.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And verily the Hereafter shall be better for you than the first [life].

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And verily your Lord shall give you and you shall be satisfied.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Did He not find you an orphan and shelter you?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And did He not find you erring and guided you?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: And did He not find you needy and enrich you?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: So, as for the orphan, do not oppress [him],

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and as for the beggar, do not drive [him] away,

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and as for your Lord’s grace, proclaim [it].

Name: Solace
Verse: Did We not expand your breast for you,

Name: Solace
Verse: and relieve you of your burden,

Name: Solace
Verse: that which weighed down your back?

Name: Solace
Verse: Did We not exalt your mention?

Name: Solace
Verse: For truly with hardship comes ease.

Name: Solace
Verse: Truly with hardship comes ease.

Name: Solace
Verse: So when you are finished, toil

Name: Solace
Verse: and seek your Lord.

Name: The Fig
Verse: By the fig and the olive,

Name: The Fig
Verse: and [by] the Mount Sinai,

Name: The Fig
Verse: and [by] this secure land,

Name: The Fig
Verse: Verily We created man in the best of forms.

Name: The Fig
Verse: Then, We reduced him to the lowest of the low,

Name: The Fig
Verse: except those who believe and perform righteous deeds, for they shall have an unfailing reward.

Name: The Fig
Verse: So what makes you deny thereafter the Judgement?

Name: The Fig
Verse: Is not God the fairest of all judges?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite: In the Name of your Lord Who created,

Name: The Clot
Verse: created man from a blood-clot.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite: and your Lord is the Most Generous,

Name: The Clot
Verse: Who taught by the pen —

Name: The Clot
Verse: taught man what he did not know.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Nay, but verily man is [wont to be] rebellious,

Name: The Clot
Verse: when he sees it to be self-sufficient.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Surely to your Lord is the return.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you seen him who forbids

Name: The Clot
Verse: a servant when he prays?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you considered what if he should be upon [a path of] guidance,

Name: The Clot
