Verse: or be bidding [others] to fear of God?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Have you considered what if he should be denying [God’s guidance] and turning away?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Is he not aware that God sees?

Name: The Clot
Verse: No indeed! Assuredly if he does not desist, We shall seize him by the forelock,

Name: The Clot
Verse: a lying, iniquitous forelock!

Name: The Clot
Verse: Let him, then, call upon [the henchmen of] his council.

Name: The Clot
Verse: We shall call the Zabāniya.

Name: The Clot
Verse: No indeed! Do not obey him, and prostrate yourself, and draw near.

Name: Power
Verse: Lo! We revealed it on the Night of Ordainment.

Name: Power
Verse: And what will show you what the Night of Ordainment is?

Name: Power
Verse: The Night of Ordainment is better than a thousand months.

Name: Power
Verse: The angels and the Spirit descend in it by the leave of their Lord with every command.

Name: Power
Verse: It is peaceful until the rising of the dawn.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: The disbelievers from among the People of the Scripture and the idolaters were not going to leave off until the clear proof should come to them;

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: a messenger from God reciting pages purified,

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: wherein are upright precepts.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: And those who were given the Scripture did not become divided, except after the clear proof had come to them.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: And they were only commanded to worship God devoting religion purely to Him as ?an?fs and to establish prayer and pay the alms. That is the upright religion.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Truly the disbelievers from among the People of the Scripture and the idolaters shall be in the fire of Hell, to abide therein — those are the worst of creatures.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Truly those who believe and perform righteous deeds — they are the best of creatures.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eden underneath which rivers flow, wherein they shall abide forever. God is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. That is [the reward] for him who fears his Lord.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: When earth is shaken with its [final] quake,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and the earth brings forth its burdens,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and man says, ‘What is wrong with it?’

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: On that day it shall relate its chronicles,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: for its Lord will have inspired it.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: On that day mankind shall issue forth in separate groups to be shown their deeds.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good shall see it,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil shall see it.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: By the chargers snorting,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: by the strikers of sparks,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: by the dawn-raiders

Name: The Coursers
Verse: raising therein a trail of dust,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: cleaving therewith a host.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Verily man is ungrateful to his Lord,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: and verily to that he is a witness.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: And verily in the love of wealth he is avid.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Does he not know that, when that which is in the graves is strewn,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: and that which is in the breasts is obtained,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: on that day their Lord will indeed be Aware of them?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: The Clattering Blow.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: What is the Clattering Blow?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what will show you what the Clattering Blow is?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: The day mankind will be like scattered moths

Name: The Calamity
Verse: and the mountains will be like tufts of wool.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: Then as for him whose scales weigh heavy,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: he will enjoy a pleasant life,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: but as for him whose scales weigh light,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: his home will be the Abyss.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what will show you what it is?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: A scorching fire.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Rivalry [in worldly things] distracts you

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: until you visit the graves.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No indeed! You will come to know!

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Again, no indeed! You will come to know.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No indeed! Were you to know with certain knowledge

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: you would surely see hell-fire.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Then, on that day, you will assuredly be questioned about the comforts [of the world].

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: By Time!

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: Verily man is in [a state of] loss,

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: except those who believe, and perform righteous deeds, and enjoin one another to [follow] the truth, and enjoin one another to patience.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Woe to every backbiter, [who is a] slanderer,

Name: The Traducer
Verse: who amasses wealth and counts it over.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Nay! He will surely be flung into the Crusher.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: And what will show you what the Crusher is?

Name: The Traducer
Verse: which peers over the hearts.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Lo! it will be closed in on them

Name: The Traducer
Verse: in outstretched columns.

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Have you not considered the way in which your Lord dealt with the Men of the Elephant?

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Did He not make their stratagem go astray,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: and unleashed upon them swarms of birds,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: pelting them with stones of baked clay,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: thus making them like devoured blades?

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: their security for the journey of winter and of summer,

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: let them worship the Lord of this House,

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure from fear.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: Have you seen him who denies the Judgement?

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: That is he who repels the orphan

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: and does not urge the feeding of the needy.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: So woe to them who pray,

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: those who are heedless of their prayers,

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: those who make a pretence,

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: and deny aid.

Name: Abundance
Verse: We have assuredly given you Abundance.

Name: Abundance
Verse: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

Name: Abundance
Verse: Indeed it is your antagonist who is the severed one.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Say: ‘O disbelievers!

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: I do not worship what you worship,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: and you do not worship what I worship,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: nor will I worship what you have worshipped,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: nor will you worship what I worship.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: You have your religion and I have my religion.

Name: Succour
Verse: When the help of God comes together with victory

Name: Succour
Verse: and you see people entering God’s religion in throngs,

Name: Succour
Verse: then glorify with praise of your Lord and seek forgiveness from Him; for verily He is ever ready to relent.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: Perish the hands of Abū Lahab and perish he!

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: His wealth will not avail him, nor what he has earned.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: He will [soon] enter a Fire of flames,

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: and his wife the carrier of firewood

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: with a rope of palm-fibre around her neck.

Name: The Unity
Verse: Say: ‘He is God, One.

Name: The Unity
Verse: God, the Self-Sufficient, Besought of all.

Name: The Unity
Verse: He neither begot, nor was begotten.

Name: The Unity
Verse: Nor is there anyone equal to Him’.

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: Say: ‘I seek refuge in the Lord of the Daybreak,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: from the evil of what He has created,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: and from the evil of darkness when it gathers,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: and from the evil of the women-blowers on knots,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: and from the evil of an envier when he envies’.

Name: Mankind
Verse: Say: ‘I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: the King of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: the God of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: from the evil of the slinking whisperer,

Name: Mankind
Verse: who whispers in the breasts of mankind,

Name: Mankind
Verse: of the jinn and mankind’.
